name: Summer Daze: Tilly's Tale
description: A funny and charming visual novel adventure. Be a rogue among heroes in this professionally voiced fantasy story!

name: Story of Infinity: Xia
description: "Story of Infinity: Xia" is A martial arts style Roguelike adventure A·RPG standalone game. The background of the story is set for the martial arts, the internal force martial repair system was born soon. Allow you to explore the uplifting changes in the world of Reiki in a pleasant blow.

name: Birdie Wing: Golf Girls' Story
description: Let's experience the exciting golf in the world of Birdie Wing!

name: Hakuoki SSL: Sweet School Life for Nintendo Switch
description:
Spring, a season of blessing for new encounters. Yukimura Chizuru knocks on the gates of a private academy, which has since been a boys' school. However, as of this year, Hakuou Academy opens its gates to co-education and Chizuru is the only female student enrolled. Thus, begins her first year.

This edition comes with cards and some other extras.

name: Pixel Ripped 1978
description:
The golden age of ATARI is back! And now you can live in it!

Pixel Ripped 1978 is a love letter to everything ATARI. In this totally interactable environment in VR, players are caught in the eye of the hurricane in a whacky time-traveling adventure where they are one of the main programmers at ATARI and have to get INSIDE the gaming world to prevent history from being rewritten by a pesky super-villain!

Grab your favorite headset and get ready for some good ol'nostalgia wackiness!

name: Let's Play Jigsaw Puzzles: Birds
description: Get ready to spread your wings and soar through a world of stunning avian beauty.

name: The Segment Twins
description: The Twin Hunters fell into The Segment World... Combat various monsters and bosses, and complete their segmented journey! The Segment Twins is a hack-and-slash game with simple controls and a unique character tag action feature.

name: Detuned
description: An eerie anti-rhythm hiden-object roguelike. Avoid a procedurally generated song. Look for pearls in a surreal wonderland. Experience hyperacusis from the comfort of your seat.

name: Layers of Fear 2
description: A remake of Layers of Fear 2 and its DLC. This remake in Unreal Engine 5 adds new core mechanics and features to blend the chapters together seamlessly.

name: Layers of Fear
description: A remake of the original Layers of Fear and its DLC, as well as a new DLC from the perspective of the painter's wife. This remake in Unreal Engine 5 adds new core mechanics and features to blend the chapters together seamlessly.

name: Taxi Copter
description: Take on the role of a taxi driver in a crazy helicopter. Pick up passengers and drive them to their destination. Fight against the gravity, be gentle, it's a helicopter, not a tank! Earn money, get stars and unlock more levels. A city full of passengers (and pigeons!) is waiting for you!

name: Druidwalker
description: You are a druid preparing the forest for winter. Traverse the paths at your own pace, meet the animals, enjoy the music, all wrapped in a peaceful roguelike experience.

name: Stressed Out
description: Nothing better than smashing stuff in VR when you're stressed out.

name: Dead District: Survival
description: Dead District is a multiplayer and single-player survival sandbox game in an open world where the player has a wide range of options.

name: Jorel's Brother and the Most Important Game of the Galaxy
description: Jorel’s Brother and The Most Important Game of the Galaxy is a point-and-click adventure about an eight-year-old boy who lives with his eccentric family in the shadow of Jorel, his handsome and popular brother. Based on the award-winning Brazilian animation Jorel’s Brother.

name: Layers of Fear
description:
Layers of Fear is a first-person psychedelic horror chronicle focused on tense exploration and immersive storytelling - a new game built upon the foundations of Layers of Fear, LOF: Inheritance, and Layers of Fear 2 with a surprising new story and gameplay direction

All stories must come to an end, even twisted and eerie ones. The canvas. The stage. The novel. This narrative-focused psychological horror experience is ready for its final brushstrokes, its curtain call, its final chapter. Are you ready to return and face your fears one last time?

name: Grand Theft Gato: Vice Kitty
description: Work for the Meowfia or work for the Purrlice, it’s your choice. Drive cars, scale buildings, steal, get into back-alley fights, or rob banks. Bring your friends to have a crew!

name: Fall of Porcupine
description: Guide young Finley through his first weeks at a provincial hospital. He is on fire for his apprenticeship as an internist. But a lot of pressure makes Finley's life difficult and our gameplay challenging.

name: The Zone: Stalker Stories
description:
The Zone: Stalker Stories is a hybrid top-down RPG / deckbuilder card game, with a story-driven focus and full plot.

It features unique hand-drawn art, exploration, quests, card battles, and detailed inventory management where your choice of equipment determines your deck.

name: ProtoCorgi
description: Retro style pixel art, horizontal shoot 'em up, arcade gameplay and the cutest little cyber hero you will ever meet. Play as Bullet, a C³ class (Cute Cyber Corgi) cybernetic pup in his quest for saving his owner, a brilliant scientist kidnaped by a strange alien race that wants to rule the galaxy.

name: Family Life
description: Manage your family's genealogical tree by making choices about their life events and investing in the family's business.

name: Combat Mission: Red Thunder
description: Combat Mission Red Thunder focuses on the hard fought Eastern Front battles of Bagration and Poland, from the swamps of Belarus to the gates of Warsaw during the summer of 1944.

name: BattleBit Remastered
description: BattleBit Remastered is a low-poly, massive multiplayer FPS, supporting 254 players per server. Battle on a near-fully destructible map with various vehicles!

name: Auld Lang Syne: Cat and Mouse
description:
Auld Lang Syne: Cat and Mouse is a visual novel made in RPG Maker VX Ace.

It's a Granblue Fantasy fangame about two Zodiacs of many years in the past.

You don't need to know much about Granblue Fantasy, only that its setting is a world of floating islands with its own fantasy races, and that there's a group of characters inspired on the Chinese Zodiac/the Twelve Divine Generals.

With the exception of the minor NPCs and Dormouse, it's all original characters and story.

name: Vigor: Battle-Hardened Merc
description: Sin descripción

name: Chase Me!
description:
This is a little game for the 2024 NOMAM's BASIC 10-liners Contest. This program fits in the EXTREM-256 category, and it was written using FastBasic 4.6 for the 8-bits ATARI XL/XE computers line

Collect as many coins as you can while being chased by some evil guardians.

name: PUBG: Battlegrounds - Season 24
description: A new challenging Season of Ranked – Season 24 has arrived with this update.

name: WWE 2K23: Race to NXT Pack
description:
The Race to NXT Pack includes the franchise debut of WWE Hall of Famer Harley Race, as well as NXT Superstars Tony D'Angelo, Trick Williams, Wendy Choo, and Ivy Nile.

Each playable Superstar comes with their own MyFACTION card.

The Race to NXT Pack is included with the WWE 2K23 Season Pass.

name: WG Mega
description: Over 40 levels by William Gee. 4 FULL singleplayer Episodes and 1 dukematch.

name: Shitataru Nikki
description:
Shitataru Nikki is an exploration of the thoughts and mind of the most deplorable and sickening human being possible. You play as Keko, a criminal hiding from the law, as he holes himself up in a dingy hotel room and waits for the heat to die down.

It was developed for the 2023 Dream Diary Jam

name: Infinite Random Defense
description: "Infinite Random Defense" is a tile-based rogue-like defense game. Your objective is to combine various units and strategically place them to defeat the incoming enemies. The map expands with each passing moment, challenging you to research the most efficient unit composition and deployment. Build your own unique strategy and defend your realm.

name: Laid-Back Camp All-in-one!!
description:
Familiar characters like Nadeshiko Kagamihara, Rin Shima, Chiaki Ōgaki, Aoi Inuyama, and Ena Saitō engage in dynamic and fully-voiced dialogues. Moreover, the game is packed with over 1,000 types of camping gear and vehicles, mouth-watering camp meals, and beautiful sceneries from locations centered around Yamanashi, Nagano, and Shizuoka, bringing you the world of "Laid-Back Camp".

Why don't you come and watch everyone you know camping?

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R - Season Pass 2
description:
The JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R Season Pass includes 3 playable characters. Experience the full JoJo universe with the All-Star Battle R Season Pass 2! Unlock new characters with new and bizarre abilities!

Season Pass 2 includes:
• DLC Character 5
• DLC Character 6
• DLC Character 7

Season Pass 2 Bonuses:
• DLC Character early access
• Giorno Giovanna Haruno Shiobana Costume
Start your journey on the path to being a Gang-star as Haruno Shiobana before he became known as Giorno Giovanna!

name: War Thunder: Su-39 Pack
description: This Pack includes: Su-39 (Rank 7 USSR);Premium account for 20 days;2500 Golden Eagles.

name: War Thunder: M1 KVT Pack
description: This Pack includes: M1 KVT (Rank 6 USA);Premium account for 15 days;2000 Golden Eagles.

name: Funny Alphabet
description: Learn the first letters with us in our game Funny Alphabet, where your child have to guess the correct letter to the correct image.

name: New Lands 2
description:
See what it’s like to be a farmer and maker of sweet treats. Grow cocoa trees, build mills and make squirrel houses. Decorate your own farmhouse. The farther you go into the new lands, the more varied your tasks will be and the harder they’ll be to complete.
Work your new lands and become the best maker of sweet treats around in new time management game New Lands 2!

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R - Ultimate Edition
description:
The Ultimate Edition includes:
• Full game
• Season Pass
• Season Pass 2
• 5 Special Event Outfits
• Jolyne Cujoh's Prisoner Uniform Outfit

JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R brings Hirohiko Araki's masterpiece to life in fighting game form!

Battle with 50 colorful characters from the world of JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, wielding Stands, Hamon, and more!
See how characters who could never meet in the story interact when they come face to face!

Even newcomers to the fighting game genre can have fun with one-button combos and ultimate moves.

name: Project Speed: Njarovik
description: Do you want to play on a new map, but on the original Project Speed game? This DLC is for you! - This DLC adds the Njarovik map from Project Speed 2 to Project Speed.

name: Dragon Arise
description: Dragon Arise is an RPG game with a fantasy dragon-collecting theme. Developed by Ocean Games, it incorporates several traditional RPG elements that will surely please genre enthusiasts. As the chosen "Savior" of the world, your role involves leading a group of Dragons on a series of adventures to combat the invasion of the Cursed Dragons. The game offers various activities, such as competing for Dragon Souls in the Dragon Lairs, undertaking challenges in the Tower of Infinity, collecting diverse Dragoneggs, and developing your own island. Additionally, Dragon Arise provides exhilarating PvP battles in the arena, ensuring a continuous sense of excitement.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II - Season 04
description:
Al Mazrah, Urzikstan, Ashika Island, Las Almas . . . and now, Vondel.
The waterfront district of a Baroque European city where centuries of old-world history blends with modern architectural developments, Vondel saw a complete evacuation due to an imminent attack threat, right as Operators descended into the darkness of the Al Mazrah Koschei Complex during a fierce sandstorm at the culmination of Season 03.
While Vondel is a brand-new locale for Operators to explore, the ensuing chaos is part of a plan activated by a familiar and infamous masked figure, whose forces are operating in both Al Mazrah and Vondel. Peer through the dust clouds, and you’ll recognize the apparent leader of these unknown forces:
His name is Nikto. And he’s ready to Run This Town.

name: Idle: Generators
description: An IDLE game for your fun and relaxation. Generators based gameplay and two prestige systems with various gameplay possibilities

name: Restaurant Simulator 2023
description: Welcome to Restaurant Simulator 2023! Experience the joy of running your own restaurant in this cute and relaxing economy game. With charming graphics, automate your workflow to maximize income, hire managers to keep your workers motivated, and make smart investments to boost your economy!

name: Cyberside Picnic
description: Cyberside Picnic is a eulogy for the cyberian commonplace that just eluded us. A love letter to a lost future of alternative video games, delete and overwrite.

name: Tunguska: Dead Zone
description: The Dead Zone DLC brings players back to Tunguska Exclusion Zone for two additional playthroughs, each being a New Game+ mode with new challenges, new weapons, and new experience. Are you ready to return to the action?

name: Reflector Rhythm Master
description: A hybrid of a block breaker and a music game. A strange and fun mechanic where all of the stages fit on one screen. And the antithesis of the easy-to-see music game.

name: Etrian Odyssey III HD Character Set DLC
description: Originally available as a pre-order bonus, and extended for two weeks as an early purchase reward, this purchase adds the ATLUS-themed character portraits of Nahobino from Shin Megami Tensei V and Aigis from Persona 3 Portable to your character creation options.

name: Etrian Odyssey II HD: Character Set DLC
description: Originally available as a pre-order bonus, and extended for two weeks as an early purchase reward, this purchase adds the ATLUS-themed character portraits of Demi-fiend from Shin Megami Tensei III: Nocturne and Teddie from Persona 4 Golden to your character creation options.

name: Etrian Odyssey HD Character Set DLC
description: Originally available as a pre-order bonus, and extended for two weeks as an early purchase reward, this purchase adds the ATLUS-themed character portraits of Joker from Persona 5 Royal and Ringo from Soul Hackers 2 to your character creation options.

name: Solar Showdown
description: Welcome to Solar Showdown - the ultimate 2-player couch competitive game where you harvest solar power, build defenses, and produce minions to attack your opponent's towers. Generate enough power to activate your base's ultimate weapon and blow up your rival! Grow, build, defend, and dominate!

name: The Cursed Amulet
description: Enter a mysterious cave and put your puzzle-solving skills to the test. Explore the depths of the cave, search for clues, and solve challenging puzzles that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

name: Cube Airport
description: Cube Airport is a puzzle game where your objective is to construct a runway to enable the airplane to take off safely. To do this, you need to correctly fit the runway cubes into the indicated positions on the platform and proceed to the next level.

name: Kessler Syndrome
description: Alone in orbit with a corpse and no way to reach Earth, play as an astronaut who must keep a defunct space station aloft. Maintain the onboard systems, deal with the constant threat of space junk, and navigate the dark halls in zero-gravity. Day by day more systems fail, and the void draws closer.

name: Lofi Milk Delivery
description: Welcome to the world of milk delivery, where hot girls bring you fresh milk every day. These hard working girls are willing to do anything to get extra tips.

name: Edemn
description: Edemn is a fun and dynamic shooter about skeletons who have risen through ancient magic and are now fighting among themselves. The game is made in the style of games of the early 2000s, which creates a cool atmosphere for the game.

name: Heist Kitty: Cats Go a Stray
description: Work for the Meowfia or work for the Purrlice, it’s your choice. Drive cars, scale buildings, steal, get into back-alley fights, or rob banks. Bring your friends to have a crew!

name: Oblivion Override
description: In this fast-paced roguelike side-scroller, hack and slash your way through the Dulce Base as Crimson the combat robot. Unleash fierce rhythmic attacks, customize and retrofit your build whenever, and uncover the true past of a post-apocalyptic robotic civilization…

name: Wizardry School: Escape Room
description: The School Headmaster needs your help to recover the Philosopher's Stone. In this escape room you will have to explore your wizardry school, solve puzzles, learn new spells and put your magical skills to the test. Will you save the school?

name: Metro Simulator 2
description: Metro Simulator 2 is a unique game featuring recreated Moscow Metro and realistic train controls.

name: Dubium
description: Dubium is a five-player social deduction game set in a near-future sci-fi universe. Players take on the role of Frontier or Traitor and must escape from an abandoned space station by any means necessary. Everyone wants to get out alive. Trust no one

name: Daydream: Forgotten Sorrow
description: In this puzzle platformer, you will embark on a touching journey through the surreal world of a person's mind as a young Griffin and his faithful bear, Birly. Overcome challenges, avoid traps and defeat enemies to help the man find peace.

name: Cold Depth
description: Cold Depth is a first-person survival horror game set on the "Oasis" underwater complex. You survive or not depends on finding, recycling and 3D printing items and supplying energy to the right parts of the stations.

name: Creature Lab
description: Conduct crazy experiments in the Creature Lab! Mix mutagens, analyze their properties, grow bodyparts, and attach them to your test subjects. Manage your inventory, expand your lab, and make sure your hideout is safe. Send your creations into the city to obtain necessary salvage and test subjects!

name: Blue Protocol
description: Blue Protocol is set in a world spun by “overwhelming graphics along the lines of anime movies” and incorporates multiplayer action that utilizes the qualities of an online game. It runs on Unreal Engine 4.

name: VR Giants
description: VR Giants is a local multiplayer coop VR game that makes use of one player’s body to extend the level for the other player to explore. One player is huge (Goliath) and his avatar is controlled with a VR set. David is the tiny character which is controlled with a gamepad. Goliath must use his body as a bridge for David to cross abysses or reach higher platforms. David is tiny and is highly vulnerable to fire, spikes, and other dangers. Goliath must protect David so that he can collect coins and keys that lead both players to freedom.

name: Dead Island 2: Character Pack - Silver Star Jacob
description: Slay in style with our premium character pack. Silver Star Jacob includes the Rodeo Sunset costume and Devil's Horseshoes weapon.

name: Dead Island 2: Character Pack - Gaelic Queen Dani
description: Slay in style with our premium character pack. Character Pack - Gaelic Queen Dani includes the Thoroughly Modern Medb costume and the Brainzzz-Biter weapon.

name: Dead Island 2: Character Pack - Cyber Slayer Amy
description: Slay in style with our premium character packs - Cyber Slayer Amy includes the Neurunner costume and the Casimir & Julienne weapons.

name: Dead Island 2: Character Pack - Venice Vogue Bruno
description: Slay in style with our premium character packs. Character Pack - Venice Vogue Bruno includes the Downtown Dandy costume and Skull Driver weapon.

name: Dead Island 2: Character Pack - Steel Horse Carla
description: Slay in style with our premium character pack. Character Pack - Steel Horse Carla includes the Pantera Trueno costume and Van Flensing weapon.

name: Dragon Quest Champions
description: Sin descripción

name: Skibidi Shooter: Survival FPS
description: Confront Skibidi Toilet and other alphabet monsters or become Skibidi Toilet, the choice is your. Beware of the horror behind the doors in this arena.

name: Psyche60s
description: Immerse yourself in Psyche60s, an innovative experience that takes you back to San Francisco in the 1960s. Created by renowned photographer Roberto Rabanne, Psyche60s features unique artwork, original music, and rich historical insights. Experience a paradigm-shifting cultural "Youthquake"!

name: Metal: Hellsinger - Essential Hits Pack
description: The joy of demon-slaying to the beat exists on a spectrum, and with the Essential Hits Pack, you get the entire rainbow. Shoot to the beat of eight hit songs from bands like Muse, Depeche Mode, and Gorillaz.

name: Pacer: Classic
description: Immerse yourself in Pacer: Classic, an adrenaline-fueled anti-gravity racing game set in a vast, interconnected universe. Personalize your paceship and weapons, engage in a riveting campaign, or single-player races, or even face off against your foes in a dynamic online multiplayer race within the expansive PacerVerse.

name: Lucid Lenses
description:
Lucid Lenses is a captivating story-driven romance adventure game that takes you on a journey of love, ambition, and tough decisions.
Follow the story of a couple who meet and fall in love, but as they pursue their individual career dreams, they find themselves facing a difficult choice: continue their relationship or break up for the sake of their careers.

name: Robo Ret
description: Robo Ret is a 2D action platformer game where the player takes on the role of a robot fighting against other robot bosses.The player's main weapon is a cannon arm, which they use to shoot at the enemy bosses. The goal of the game is to defeat all of the bosses.

name: Metal: Hellsinger - Essential Hits Edition
description: The Essential Hits Edition contains Metal: Hellsinger and the Essential Hits Pack. Metal: Hellsinger is the rhythm FPS bursting with demons, badass weapons, and powerful music. With the Essential Hits Pack, slay to eight additional hit songs from Muse, Depeche Mode, and Gorillaz, and more.

name: Crank Crawl
description: Tactical dungeon puzzler

name: Pixel Puzzles: Illustrations & Anime - Jigsaw Pack: Kuniyoshi
description: Pixel Puzzles, your number one place for digital jigsaws.

name: Dead by Daylight: End Transmission
description: Dead by Daylight’s End Transmission Chapter features a new Killer – The Singularity – and a new Survivor, Gabriel Soma. A new Map, Toba Landing, is available for all players. Purchasing this add-on unlocks 2 exclusive Cosmetics: The Singularity’s Curved Scythe and Gabriel’s Illuminated Shirt.

name: Spider
description: A platform game

name: Math & Topology
description: A puzzle that challenges both the topological and mathematical skills of the player. Draw lines, use operator tiles to produce new numbers, and complete levels with square- and hexagon-shaped tiles!

name: Monophobia
description: A story where a girl (her name mono) is the only living thing left on earth literally

name: Overwatch 2: Season 5 - High-Fantasy
description:
Embark on a mythic adventure!

Join Tracer and her friends on a fantasy-themed role-playing journey. Follow the story of Adventurer Tracer as she works to save Overland from the threat of the Demon Lord Reinhardt! March into battle to test your skill and see if you have what it takes to be a Knight of the Realm.

name: Sex Story: Ruby and Hunter - Episode 1
description: A steamy Visual Novel featuring high-definition graphics and realistic-looking characters set in beautiful decor. Hunter stumbles inside an empty bar and meets Ruby - a sexy redhead bartender that offers to give him a ride home, only to end up riding him in the dirty restroom.

name: Carrom Slam!
description: Can you achieve the legendary Slam! by pocketing all your pieces in one turn? Strike, pocket, and dominate in this authentic Carrom experience! Team up with friends or join players online. Experience Pro, Points, Disc Pool, Blitz, and Training modes. Carrom Slam!

name: Neon Fantasy: Girls
description: Neon Fantasy: Girls is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime. Collect pictures, develop your attention, and feel like a part of the beautiful neon world.

name: Exchange Student
description: Exchange Student is an exciting visual novel for adults only, full of unexpected twists and unforgettable moments. You'll take on the role of James, a young student who decides to make a fresh start by moving to a new city and embarking on his university studies.

name: Cricket Captain 2023
description: Create your own cricket management legacy with Cricket Captain 2023. A new adaptive aggression system, designed for the modern game, puts you in control. Enhanced statistics include historical international player rankings (including all-rounders), real-world form data, and wicket keeper statistics.

name: Iron Armor Storm
description: Iron Armor Storm "is a 3D strategy game based on the theme of World War II Tank War, with the collection of various legendary tanks and tank strategy combinations as the core gameplay, and community-based, camp based cooperation and competition as auxiliary means.

name: Farming Simulator 22: Hay & Forage Pack
description:
Rule fields, mountains, and hills with specialized machines to maximize hay and forage resources! All 17 authentic machines in the Hay & Forage Pack make your farming-life easier and more fun.

New brands: Brielmaier, REFORM & Reiter
Also included: KRONE, PÖTTINGER, Rigitrac & Sepp Knüsel
Specialized tractors like the Rigitrac SKH 60 with a slope-compensating cabin
Precise mowers for grassland operations, even with side shift functionality
Ideal ground adjustment thanks to the unique design of the Reiter RESPIRO mergers
Easy transport with loading wagons like the modular REFORM PrimAlpin

name: Warhammer: Vermintide 2 - Karak Azgaraz
description: Karak Azgaraz is a free new content update for Warhammer: Vermintide 2. It contains three newly remastered adventure maps from the fan-favorite DLC of the first Vermintide game.

name: Overwhelmed
description:
Enter the neon world of Overwhelmed!
Fight waves of enemies, using shooting and dashing skills to evade fire. Trigger your special "Overheat" ability to defeat enemies more easily. Unlock characters, each with unique abilities and varied arsenal, to discover new gameplay styles.

name: Deviko TD
description: Raise chicks and intercept enemies! Easy tower defense game.

name: FFFL: Brutalball Manager
description: FFFL: Brutalball Manager is a Franchise Management Simulation game, based mostly on American Football in a Fantasy setting. Take full control of the entire league. Tons of customization, deep stat tracking and unique rules.

name: The Game of Annie
description: This is a third person action shooter game. Support for custom character size, support for costume change, use guns and bows for long-distance combat, can also use cold weapons for melee combat, with some training elements. Enemies include monsters and humans.

name: Synth Pong
description: Synth Pong is a twist on the classic Pong game and is perfect for anyone who loves the 80's synthwave aesthetic. You can challenge your friends in intense PvP sessions or enjoy the game solo in story mode, as well as a series of levels and challenges.

name: Rooms of Realities
description: Rooms of Realities is an anthology of virtual Escape Rooms that you can enjoy in co-op or solo mode. Discover the secret that connects all the rooms.

name: Dordogne
description:
Dordogne is a narrative adventure game in which you play as Mimi, a 32-year-old woman visiting the house of her recently deceased grandmother.

Dordogne is set both in the present and the past. In the present timeline, Mimi explores the rooms in her grandmother’s home. In the past timeline, you’ll help a 10-year-old Mimi explore Dordogne and complete her quests, affecting the present.

Along with the puzzles that both versions of Mimi will solve, you’ll collect photos, sounds, objects and words to create Mimi’s journal – keeping young Mimi’s memories of summers spent with her grandmother in Dordogne.

name: Chimeras: Blinding Love
description: Something dangerous prowls the streets... Can you find out what's targeting young men in Paris?

name: Undertale: Bits and Pieces Together
description: Undertale: Bits and Pieces Together is a mod that allows you to play the entire original Undertale Bits and pieces mod but with two players!

name: Zilado!
description: Join a friend and travel through the state of Maranhão by train preventing it from stopping because of its broken wagons by solving small puzzles on this co-op platformer game

name: One Step to Rest
description: Cross an unknown nation to escape a devastated and scarce place, seeking a land full of resources to bring rest and prosperity to its people, who bet their very lives on your journey. Defeat monsters trying to stop you in a hack'n slash, procedurally generated game!

name: Super Bafo Championship
description: On the street in your neighborhood, the biggest Bafo competition in history is taking place. Face powerful opponents in turn-based combat and collect all the cards to be known as the Grand Champion of Bafo.

name: Can You Make It Man
description: Embark on an exciting challenge as you ascend Mighty Oak Mountain in this 3D platformer. Get ready to face tough obstacles, jumping, climbing, and flying your way through a visually impressive world made of wooden blocks. Your goal? Reach the top to meet the Oak King. Show off your skills, courage, and determination in this thrilling adventure. Can you conquer the mountain and become a true champion? The decision is yours.

name: Kadu Bird
description: Sin descripción

name: Explore
description: An open world, soulslike action game with authentic battles with chibi characters.

name: Words Collide
description: Play by yourself or cooperatively with friends. Relax in Zen Mode, or challenge yourself with Adventure Mode. Carefully construct combos to achieve high scores! Discover and learn new words using our in game dictionary. Arrange letters to spell words; your friends can reuse your words to spell bigger words. Earn coins to unlock upgrades like extra letters, hints and combos. Start playing Words Collide today!

name: Kung Fu Fighting
description:
Welcome to the world of Martial Arts. It is the arcade Kung Fu fight games to enjoy martial arts games game-play, fighting animations, special effects, thrilling sounds, and real fighting styles.

Start rivalry by choosing a fighter to conquer the battle. Hold your nerves against the opponent's brilliant moves and keep an eye on every move. Use techniques like taekwondo, Muay Thai, Kung Fu, boxing, and others, to show your top-level fighting skills defeat your rivals. With stunning visual and fighting moves, you will enjoy it a lot.

name: Scavenger Hunt: Switzerland
description:
In Scavenger Hunt: Switzerland you have to solve various puzzles to reach the goal. The puzzles lead you across Switzerland in different levels.
To master the levels and the puzzles you need internet access and a web browser!
The game will be available in English and German.

name: Grimace's Birthday
description: Help Grimace find his friends in time to blow the candles out, and collect enough birthday shakes for his guests along the way!

name: VR Cops: Pack 1
description: You will get two more rifles, two pistols, an SMG, and a shotgun, for a total of six new guns.

name: VR Cops
description: In VR Cops you can customize your guns with various attachments and accessories, and feel the realistic physics and recoil as well as different handling for each gun. You will also be immersed in a gripping story of a young cop.

name: Demon Subduing Master
description: A horizontal version of casual adventure and decompression action game, where players will play a Taoist who subdues demons and eliminates them, kills the demon king, obtains the demon king's inner elixir, and strengthens their own strength.

name: Quebec Mortis
description: Quebec Mortis is a retro-styled survival horror game. It has elements from the modern survival horror games but in a NES-era fashion. It is packed with puzzles, action and a creepy atmosphere. Complete it in one evening!

name: VRC PRO: Pattaya 2 Offroad Track
description: Pattaya 2, the 2nd version of the famous Thai off-road track! A new challenging lay-out to test your r/c offroad racing skills!

name: Debug Quest
description: Debug Quest is a single-player game on an adventure to heal a bugged game world. Use blocks, items, and plugins to heal the game world and complete missions! Explore the map and connect the road with blocks!

name: Vampire Survivors: 1.5
description: This update introduces a bit of new content to the game: the stage Astral Stair, an area of endless corridors and flying paintings. It also includes a spinning wheel that can introduce random elements to the run – and if you're in streamer mode, your Twitch chat can vote to influence its outcome. There are also three new relics, a new pickup called GoldFinger, and a new form for the existing character Yatta Cavallo, which also allows you to evolve their Cherry Bomb ability into a new attack.

name: Forklift Extreme: Ultra Edition
description:
Get ready to rev your engines and stack your way to glory in Forklift Extreme simulator!
This hyper-realistic forklift game puts you in the driver's seat, with highly-detailed physics that mimic the movement and handling of real forklifts. Master a variety of forklifts with unique handling characteristics, and tackle a wide range of tasks and challenges.

name: Parkasaurus: Prehistoric Wonders
description:
10 New Animals
American Lion, Mammoth, Sabertooth, Megatherium, Eastern Puma ,Giant Capybara, Short Faced Bear, Dodo, Dire Wolf, Dwarf Pronghorn

name: DHL Box Stacker Pro
description: Beat the best in DHL Box Stacker Pro. Stack boxes as fast as possible to rise above the competition. This single player VR experience features intense gameplay. How high can you try?

name: Burger Cooking Simulator
description: Become the burger chef in the physical-based Burger Cooking Simulator. Skillfully use your hand to interact with ingredients and utensils to complete orders. Grill, fry, make burgers, watch your time, and keep your customers in a good mood.

name: White Night Dream
description: White Night Dream is a card-based strategy rogue-lite game where a girl chases after a runaway cat on the streets at midnight. The game cleverly simulates the short yet long night through a simple card-flipping gameplay and a variety of interesting build combinations.

name: F1 23: Champions Edition
description: F1 23 Champions Edition and receive 3 days Early Access, Max Verstappen designed racing in-game items, 4 New My Team Racing Icons, 4 Braking Point 2 My Team Icons and much more!

name: Marabundle
description: Play a series of small games of multiple genres, each with a unique playstyle and visuals! Defeat skeletons, play cards, ride a train or fight aerial combat in this collection of indie games.

name: Oil Era
description: Have you ever dreamed of mining oil, building your own petroleum empire, earning billions of dollars, and becoming a world-renowned oil tycoon? Oil Era provides you with the opportunity to realize your dream! In this oil miner business simulation game, you can bid to exploit the oil, sell oil and gas, build your own oil refinery and chemical plant, and embark on the road to become an Oil Tycoon!

name: Brewpub Simulator
description: Quit your day job, open a bar! Brew lagers, stouts and IPAs, and serve patrons at your own brewpub. Decorate the place, create your own brands of beer, and expand into the best joint in town. All of this in a relaxing simulator that values creativity and passion for crafting.

name: Undawn
description: Undawn is an open-world survival adventure where you can traverse solo or join up with fellow survivors to explore a post-apocalyptic world where deadly environments and terrifying creatures await. Play your way as you build your home settlement, craft and upgrade your gear and develop the skills necessary to survive in this harsh new reality.

name: Classic Sport Driving
description: A retro racer for racing lines lovers! Get back to 1990, try to read the road ahead, brake as late as possible, avoid missing the apex, exit curves at the limit and reach the next checkpoint!

name: My First Date RPG: Oriana - Story Three
description: Sin descripción

name: Urbex Alone
description: A VHS Found Footage Urbex Simulation horror with emphasis on atmosphere, unpredictability, realism and a non-linear design, focusing on the feeling of providing a realistic solo urban exploration in a abandoned construction building.
Sin descripción

name: Super Mario 74: The Twelve Year Comet
description: Sin descripción

name: Lunacy
description: Lunacy is a wild journey to the moon and back! Pineapple Under the Sea Speedmapping Series welcomes back our hero from Mapping at Warpspeed, Zorglo Blaskowicz IX, on another Skillsaw-inspired quest to defeat the enemy aliens encroaching on the cheese production facilities of Luna, and to ingest as much dairy as possible.

name: Cat and Ladder Climb
description: Cat and Ladder Climb is a 2D pixel vertical scrolling action game. Jump over scaffolding, use "ladders", and aim for the top goal!There are various modes such as Default mode aiming for the top, Endless mode competing to see how high you can climb, and offline PvP mode!

name: Bung Ball
description: Bung Ball is a of game the which that if you of in the ball out with it ability then that for other which players to arena off and win.

name: The Pulse of Evil
description: Find yourself on a mission exploring the depth of an ominous forgotten mine. You arrive barehanded but quickly find the tools needed to go deeper. Destroy the infected living parts of the mine and face the final threat and complete your mission.

name: Launch Director
description: A walking simulator where you can launch rockets! Become the Launch Director for a commercial space transportation company. Can you configure these reusable rockets for a successful launch, ascent and landing?

name: Gobbo Goes Adventures
description: Gobbo Goes Adventures is a isometric puzzle game with post industrial comic style.

name: Ashes to Ashes
description: Shoot your way to vengeance as the infamous undead gunslinger Quinn Del Ramo. In this weird wild west, experience a story-driven action-packed adventure with bullets, magic, and betrayal.

name: Long Since The Eschaton
description:
It’s been five years since the apocalypse started, the zombies are slowly decomposing, even new zombies don’t last due to the lack of food source. The last two humans on earth find themselves stumbling upon each other. While one struggles to keep herself alive, the other just wants to end it all.

Long Since the Eschaton follows Kirana, a medic who switched between one survivor group to another until she’s all that’s left. She met Gabe, a self-sustaining survivor who stayed at the same town since the beginning of the plague. Slowly but surely, the two bond and perhaps help each other cope.

name: Snow Fight
description: A multiplayer snowball fight game using snowmen.

name: Tobia's Animal Farm
description: Coming home late at night, the last thing Hel expected was to see her daughter waiting for her - She wants to read a bedtime story together!

name: Kunoichi Demon Slayers
description: In the not-so-distant future, demons suddenly appear worldwide, leaving chaos and destruction in their wake. But amidst the despair, a group of ninja warriors emerges to defend humanity and vow to eradicate the demons.

name: Violetshift
description:
This is a collaborative set of 13 Boom-compatible (-cl9) levels made from and inspired by Stardate 20x7. Proto-slaughter, tight skirmishes, casual combat, and various puzzlery await, all splotched with purple for the eyes to feast on. This is a mix of short void vignettes and extensive gothic/cavernous menageries, so maybe there's something for everyone here.
This set is comparable to late Sunlust, Fractured Worlds, and its very inspiration. Difficulty settings have been taken into account, and we've done our best to make HNTR/HMP enjoyable experiences while still being somewhat challenging.

name: Kowloon's Rhizome: A Day of the Fire - Vol. 1
description: Kowloon's Rhizome: A Day of the Fire is an Adventure game.

name: Childhood Homes: And Why We Hate Them
description:
Welcome back.

After over a decade, you return home.

name: Wexew Mexem
description:
Wexew Mexem is a vertical scrolling shoot 'em up by Japanese developer Zakichi. It takes inspiration from games like Exed Exes and Xexex.

By activating "High Point Mode" when your energy is at full power, you can also destroy enemy bullets, turning enemies into bonus items.
If you press the mode activation button during "high point mode", you will return to normal mode at any time.

Your attack has a range, and if you move up, the range will be longer, and if you move down, the range will be shorter, but the power will be doubled.

name: Touring
description: Touring card game for the Panic Playdate

name: Quantum Phantom Basketball
description: Quantum Phantom Basketball is a basketball-fighting game set in a cataclysmic high fantasy New York City.

name: Johnny Rocketfingers Complete Game Collection!
description: Johnny Rocketfingers Complete Game Collection! The internet smash hit Point & Click Adventure game, "Johnny Rocketfingers," is finally available to play from your desktop computer!

name: Madcar F-1 Multiplayer
description: One rule : Press the pedal!

name: Lita's Dream
description: Popular high school girl Lita finds herself trapped in a strange dreamlike world. She needs to escape from a dangerous, eerie castle with the help of her mysterious ally, Ian.

name: Sáivu
description: Sáivu: Spill basert på samisk kultur. Utforsk 8 årstider med unike utfordringer. Vinn gaver til offersteinen. Hjelpespill: Joikememory, eventyr, overnaturlige. Bygg lavvo, joik dyr, lag medisin, bekjemp overnaturlige, jakt, fang rein, lag duodji, fisk på isen. Avslutningsspørsmål om læring.

name: Z World
description: Supernatural aerial combat open world action adventurer. Defend the city against monstrous invasions. This game features interactive NPCs, levitation powers, and avatar choices. Explore.

name: Blind Fishes
description: The friendly blind fishes are in danger! Solve the puzzles and save them.

name: Exorsite
description: TPS/RTS You are an avatar whose soul can leave the body on a mission to resolve a conflict shrouded in mystery. Discover your purpose as you fight the enemy with 2 perspectives and different units at your disposal in a human war created by specters and demons.

name: Dropsol
description: Dropsol is a retro-style arcade game where, equipped only with a parasol that reduces your speed, you have to dodge obstacles and take special items to increase your chances of getting a big score.

name: Dessert DIY: Complete Edition
description:
Preparing delicious desserts is a piece of cake. Try it yourself!
Make sweet ice cream, popsicles and waffles using your creativeness in one of the best dessert decorating games right now.

name: Hana: Hide and Seek
description: You move into the city, away from your family. Luckily you find a cheap goshiwon. Although, the day you move in weird things started to happen. You keep seeing this woman... A woman with long black hair covering her face, scrawny body, with long deformed limbs. And the more you fear it, the stronger it gets. And it won't stop until you're dead... will you survive?

name: Forced Sacrifice: Hejled
description: This game provides a fun and challenging experience for gamers who enjoy fast, skill-based arcade-style games with immersive audiovisuals and a focus on high scores.

name: Enatus Radi
description: After the protagonist wakes up, he finds that he has lost his memory. The first girl he met named Ena also lost her memory. In order to find the reason and the truth, they embarked on a journey to the world.

name: Smushi Come Home
description: Play as a tiny lil' mushroom who's lost in the forest and can't find its way home. Explore unique areas freely at your own pace, chat with friendly inhabitants, and take on different adventures to get back home!

name: Mark Out! The Wrestling Card Game
description: COLLECT, CRAFT, and BATTLE your way to the top in this wrestling move collectible card game that lets you innovate like never before. Enter the ring a rookie...leave as the GOAT!

name: Frogsong
description: Frogsong is a heartfelt adventure where it's okay to be small. You'll make new friends, explore beautiful environments, and embark on a journey to find your place in the world.

name: Battle Teams 2
description:
Battle Teams 2 - new FTP online-shooter in the setting of the future of alternative world.
Multiple game modes, tons of content and diverse gameplay are waiting for you.
Join the dynamic battles!

name: Interstellar Interruption
description: Sin descripción

name: Dead Station 2
description:
Humanity has colonized the Moon and Mars. The search for extraterrestrial civilizations is among the main ideas of man. For the purpose of a more detailed study of space, as well as the search for other civilizations, research bases are being created. One such base, "TAU-9", was set up on Titan, Saturn's moon.

But one day, "TAU-9" stopped communicating. For this reason, a rescue shuttle was sent to Titan. But approaching the Titan, for some reason, the shuttle loses control...

name: Pegged
description: Sin descripción

name: The Restricted Archive
description:
A point & click adventure created for Adventure Jam 2023.

A voice in your sleep orders you to steal the fabled Necronomicon from the library of the world-renownd Miskatonic University. Will giving in and doing it finally put an end to your nightmares?

name: Deathmatch Dimension
description: A single player episode containing 10 maps inspired by the official Quake deathmatch maps. Features four previously released and now updated maps, as well as five completely new maps and a start map. Most levels are medium-sized and take 10-20 minutes to complete. All maps can be played in sp, coop or dm and support all skill levels.

name: Bold Moves+
description:
What do you get when you combine match 3, word puzzles, and inspirational quotes? A match 3 made in heaven! Get your daily dose of positivity with Bold Moves+, the positively relaxing (and challenging) match 3 word puzzle game.
Match 3 colors to collect letter tiles, break through obstacles, and solve the phrase to find inspiration from motivational quotes and positive affirmations. Earn rewards and boosters, progress through chapters of puzzles, and win limited-time events.

name: Pokemon Black 2: DE
description: Pokemon Black 2: DE offers an authentic Unova experience with a region almost exclusively filled with double-battles, a "challenging-but-not-kaizo" difficulty level, balance changes to improve viability and variety, postgame and all-new content within the main adventure, and a bunch of quality-of-life improvements!

name: The Sailor’s Guide to Game Design
description: The Sailor’s Guide to Game Design is an interactive visual novel try to use a 'Dialect' narrative style in games, Writing from the Margins.

name: Pixel's Time Paradox
description:
When Pixel learns that author T. T. Hunter has killed himself, he’s devastated. Now he might never know how his favourite book series ends! So, he does what any inventor cat would do: he builds a time machine, to travel back to the novelist’s final hours, in hopes of preventing the tragic act.

But things are never that easy. In this latest addition to the Inspector Waffles universe—created in two weeks for Adventure Jam 2023—help Pixel, along with his flamingo pal JayJay, to solve time travel puzzles, avoid paradoxes, and save the day for literature fans everywhere!

name: Angel Link
description: Angel Li is a Flash game featuring matching. Connect identical cards to eliminate them. The operation is easy. Elements of beautiful girls enhance the adventure in a different world.

name: Theft Ride Legacy: Extended Edition
description:
Get ready for an adrenaline-packed adventure in "Theft Ride Legacy"!
Bundle includes an "Extra Mission Pack" !

name: The Third Wish
description: The Third Wish is a sci-fi point & click adventure about a family and fate and consequence. Full voice acting.

name: Gavril
description: A short horror VN that's more satirical than scary. Your goal is to survive an encounter with a home intruder with characteristics beyond your comprehension.

name: Paratopic + Food Truck Tycoon
description: Dive into surreal exploration and culinary mastery with the Paratopic + Food Truck Tycoon Bundle!

name: Fatum Betula + Urban Flow
description: Dive into a world of magic and urban management with the captivating Fatum Betula + Urban Flow Bundle!

name: Mechanic 8230: Deluxe Edition
description: Mechanic 8230: Escape from Ilgrot is a puzzle point & click adventure, set in the ruined city of Ilgrot. Use anything you can find to progress through the story.

name: Anime Beauty Girl Puzzle: Love Game History Adventure
description: Welcome to the captivating anime-themed puzzle game!

name: UD Cave
description:
UD Cave is a fast-paced one-button game.

Your screen is split in halves with a cave in each half. You control two characters simultaneously going through the caves on each side. The cave on the right is upside down. Press a button to make both characters go right. Collect coins on the way to score points.

The game is over when either of the two characters hits the sides of the cave.

name: Automobilista 2: Circuit de Barcelona-Catalunya
description: Circuit de Barcelona Catalunya has arrived for AMS2, featuring both recent Grand Prix layouts.

name: Cool Kid Cody: Season 2 - Episode 10
description: Season 2 Episode 10: Neon Genesis Armageddon! It's time to make good with everyone Mini's ever wronged, and what better way than saving them from Rhyme's wrath?

name: Detectives United II: The Darkest Shrine - Collector's Edition
description: Your favorite detectives have teamed up for another mystery and this one spans the globe! James, Anna, and the Mystery Trackers each rush to investigate paranormal activity related to places from their past cases. Meanwhile, a dark organization looms over them all, threatening to take them out.

name: Greyhill Incident: Found Footage Mode
description: This Special "Found Footage Mode" adds the option to experience the Story of Greyhill through a very classic 90s Black and white Body Cam.

name: Nobody's Dilemma
description: Uncover the secrets of a war-torn kingdom in "Nobody's Dilemma," a captivating 2D action-adventure. Engage in intense battles, navigate treacherous environments, and immerse yourself in a story of intrigue and revenge. Will you triumph over the challenges that lie ahead?

name: Stellar Version 1.0
description: When 17 year old Sadie Finley discovers that her favorite fictional character from one of the video games she plays, Eugene Fellure, has somehow been transported to the real world, Sadie decides to embark on a journey to figure out how this happened and how the impossible could be possible.

name: Ma3
description: You play as Mahi and ma3 to save the peoples from bad peoples. when you mahi you live a normal life but, if you are ma3 then you will be the people's lifesaver.

name: Dragon Ball: The Breakers - Season 3
description:
Caught in by an unexpected temporal phenomenon, seven ordinary citizens find themselves stranded in a Temporal Seam: they share their imprisonment with the Raider, a menacing enemy from another timeline with an overwhelming power.

5 spaceships plummet from the sky, landing with a crash: Guldo, Jeice, Burter, Reecom and Ginyu are preparing for their mission. The Ginyu Force readies their overwhelming tactics based on teamwork and prepares to take off!

name: Portal Reloaded: The Cooperative Update
description:
Return to the Enrichment Center for even more time travel adventures! The Cooperative Update introduces 20 brand new puzzles for you to solve together with a partner.

The Cooperative Testing Initiative is sent back to the past to retrieve some very important data that has been lost to time. One of you is in charge of shooting regular portals while the other takes care of placing time portals. This creates some very interesting gameplay mechanics, as both players rely on their partner to travel through space and time respectively.

name: Eastern Euro Truck Simulator: Real Offroad Car Driving Game Sim 4x4 Mud
description: Eastern Europe Truck Simulator offers everything a trucker’s heart desires!

name: Fortnite: Chapter 4 - Season 3: Wilds
description: Find out what Fortnite Wilds is all about when a squad uncovers what's beneath the crumbling terrain. Danger is afoot, but so is adventure! Be on the lookout for mud, raptors, and vines as these will all play a key part in navigating WILDS. Plus, an Autobot bestows his likeness upon the Island.

name: True Driver
description: Take a seat, start the engine and enjoy high speed! Choose between freemode, countdown and helirace. If you like challenges, you are at the right place! Race with time or with a helicopter! Sounds easy, right? Your blissed car is prepared for your journey, so what are you waiting for?

name: Furry Toys
description: Furry Toys - is a classic 2D game in the memory genre which is about you find the same pictures and enjoy different images of furry beautiful ladies.

name: I Commissioned Some Pigeons
description: I paid more artists to hide pigeons and bread in 15 pieces of artwork. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: Coloring Pixels: Pirates Pack
description: This Pirates-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Iconic ships, clothing and everything pirate-y! (Swash)Buckle up and get ready to find some hidden treasure!

name: Cat-aclysm
description: A 3D isometric action-adventure game where the player must use different abilities throughout the game to defeat enemies and solve puzzles.

name: Coda
description: ///CODA is an avant-garde exploration game with four diverse RPG-like chapters that each tell unique stories connected by a dynamic museum-esque overworld. Take a peak through the looking glass and wander...

name: Super Drunken Guy
description: Are you drunken enough for that game?

name: Om Nom: Run - Ultimate Edition
description:
This bundle includes:
- The base game with 140 single player campaign levels, multiple local multiplayer modes and lots of options for character customization.
- "Costumes and Themes" DLC with over 130 new outfits and skins.

name: Om Nom: Run - Costumes and Themes
description:
New outfits, skins and biomes.
This DLC includes:
-36 new caps
-32 new gloves
-36 new outfits
-32 new shoes
-2 new multiplayer map biomes

name: Dogotchi: Virtual Pet
description: ﻿Set off on a journey of nurturing and attending to your digital companion in Dogotchi: Virtual Pet. These charming dogs depicted in satisfying pixel art are bound to steal your heart!

name: HexBat
description: Challenge your Friends in this Free turn-based, chess-like strategy game with Healers, Rogues, Archers, and more! Create your own Hexagon Grids for near endless variation.

name: King of Fate
description: King of Fate is based on real history, real-time strategy, real-time control, commanding famous generals to fight fiercely on the battlefield, summoning celebrities to govern the country and the people, sweeping Liuhe like the first emperor, and ruling the world, looking forward to your joining!

name: Block Tower TD
description: Block Tower TD is a roguelike tower defense strategy game with interesting innovations. Build a world out of blocks, choose random upgrades to make every run unique.

name: Age of Fear: Total
description: This rich fantasy world loved by fans for its deep tactics and epic stories is due to become that much larger once the upcoming Ratmen enter the fold, bringing with it a brand new, meaty mainline quest for fans to battle through. But like any good adventure, it's never really over!

name: Thunderday
description: Thunderday is a twin stick shooter following a group of friends and family fighting their way and traveling through multiple worlds after their home got destroyed. Choose your hero and start your journey to find and destroy the one responsible for it.

name: Hotel Manibella
description: Get ready for the ultimate horror puzzle game! Check into Hotel Manibella for a spine-chilling experience. With a unique art style and secret storyline, journey through the floors of a haunted hotel, with each level becoming scarier and more intense.

name: Rise of Jericho
description: Lead hunter-gatherers and give rise to human civilization in Jericho, the oldest city in the world. Gather resources, craft tools and build structures to protect villagers and make your city thrive.

name: Sexy Cyberpunk Puzzle
description: Dark cyber future is not so gloomy in the company of a pretty girl!

name: Cat Souls
description: Will your 7 lives be enough? Use your lives and souls wisely to finish the levels and save your friend! Ruby and her friend went on an adventure and successfully found the mythical Hourglass of time! Sadly the end of that adventure is the beginning of a new one.

name: Planeta 55
description: Planeta 55 is a horror-themed fast action sci-fi FPS Hordes of monsters. New weaponry. Guns. Blood. Fight.

name: Magic and Machines
description: A retro fantasy RPG with turn-based battles, puzzles, and six unique characters. It's perfect for players who grew up with turn-based RPGs and are looking for a new adventure, and also accessible for new players as it doesn't take itself too seriously.

name: Avia Corporation
description: Buy planes, set prices, calculate the budget, track the passenger flow of each city, create routes for the whole world, build your ideal airline

name: Greyhill Incident: Abducted Edition
description: Greyhill Incident is a story-driven Survival-Horror game that takes place during the early 90s. As Ryan Baker, equipped with a baseball bat and a few bullets in his trusty revolver, the story takes you across the atmospheric neighbourhood of Greyhill, which is invaded by UFOs & Grey Aliens.

name: Covenant: Project Zero
description: A sci-fi action adventure space opera set on the borders of the universe governed by interstellar corporations and big money interest. Lead a rag-tag crew of misfits, solve problems and fight for your life on a voyage that will put you at odds with an ancient evil that lurks in the shadows.

name: Bazooka Bois
description:
A web3 2d shooter about having a blast blasting your friends with bazookas of all kinds.
No problem is too big for bazookas, if you are missing spice in your love life, add eggplant bazookas to it, if you are missing your marriage anniversary add bouquet bazookas to it, if you're missing gangsta rap, ain't nothing to it add bars bazookas to it.

name: Once a Porn a Time
description: Once a porn a time, is an adventure style visual novel with princesses and other strange creatures that you have to bang.

name: The Proponent
description: What if the city is a living being with its own essence? The Proponent is a first-person horror where you take on the role of a man trapped in a high-rise building and try to find a way out.

name: Energy Collector
description: An idler about collecting energy. Automate the the collection process, manage your resources by transferring them between fields and buy awesome upgrades. For what? To get more energy!

name: Distraction Machine
description: Welcome to Island City, an isolated metropolis filled with undead feeders and survivors battling over what few safe havens remain. You are The Distractor - a warrior bard wielding the power to soothe the living and control the undead. But will your music save your people or lead them to ruin?

name: Carnage in Space: Crucible
description: A fast-paced sci-fi action-platormer/beat-em-up with multiple characters and customization for replayability. Features both adjustable difficulty settings and intense post-game challenges for players of all skill levels.

name: Greyhill Incident
description: Greyhill Incident is a Survival-Horror game about classic Grey-Alien and UFO abductions. Survive the invasion of your neighborhood, investigate the outlying village, seek for helpful utilities to protect your neighbors, and hide from "The Greys."

name: South Scrimshaw
description: A science-fiction visual novel in the style of a nature documentary.

name: BlasterBeat
description: Blasterbeat is a game that combines the mechanics of a third-person session shooter and rhythm game. Battles take place in music arenas for up to 8 players.

name: Kowloon's Rhizome: A Day of the Fire
description: Kowloon’s Rhizome: A Day of the Fire is a sequel to the cult classic adventure game Kowloon's Gate. Once again set in a cyberpunk rendition of the Kowloon Walled City, it takes place 28 years later with a new story scenario and cast.

name: Eva
description:
EVA is a point-and-click suspense adventure game about a mystery in a hospital.

You wake up somewhere in the hospital without remembering anything. You are going to find out who you are, what you do by exploring the hospital. But at the same time, a greater secret slowly unveils...

name: Bloo Kid
description: Bloo Kid is a platformer by Winterworks.

name: Infernulia
description: "INFERNULIA" is a Yume Nikki type videogame where you explore the dreams world (Inferno) of Violeta, the Dreamer.

name: Frontier Fugitive
description:
America, 1876, you are the infamous gunslinger Ben Blake, somewhere in the wild west.

You escaped the shootout at Bodie after killing the towns crime boss and now you're on the run from both outlaws and the law alike. Can you loot, shoot, escape and triumph against all odds to become the perfect Frontier Fugitive?

name: Last War: Survival Game
description:
A global zombie infestation has converted many into zombies. As a survivor, your primary goal is to retain your humanity and survive.

Begin your journey with an intense survival challenge. Dodge and combat waves of zombies. It’s not just about survival; it’s about quick reflexes and strategic thinking, as each lane presents unique obstacles and zombies!

Customize your base and expand your army – you are the light in this shelter, leading people towards a glimmer of hope. In this strategic game, your choices in building and developing your base will shape the future of your survivors in a world overrun by zombies.

Assemble your ultimate team by recruiting heroes. With a choice of three military branches, each hero comes with their own unique skills. Combine different heroes to easily achieve victory against the zombies.

In the challenging world of zombies, survival is a team effort. Partner with players from all over the globe to battle the zombies. Stay alert – alliances are complex, and not every survivor you encounter is friendly.

name: Oguzok Horror
description: Oguzok needs to peel off labels from bananas! He better make it fast because chef is very angry!

name: D3ad Hand
description: D3ad Hand is a satirical graphic adventure inspired by LucasArts golden age videogames like Monkey Island and the Indiana Jones series.

name: Telnet Shooting Collection
description: Experience the iconic cutscenes and music that are synonymous with Telnet titles ( Gaiares, Granada, Psychic Storm, and Avenger), whenever you want! This collection includes convenient features like save/load anywhere, rewind, and other quality of life upgrades.

name: The Division 2: Warlords of New York - Year 5 Season 1: Broken Wings
description: In the wake of the attack at the White House, The Division has discovered that 11 people are unaccounted for and considered missing. You will be tasked to go on a high-stakes rescue mission to find the missing civilians, as they have valuable intel on the White House and The Castle Settlement.

name: Fire Emblem: Andaron Saga
description: Andaron Saga is a fully-fledged 31-chapter romhack for Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones created by Mangs and a team of talented developers and artists, featuring select gameplay elements from multiple different eras of Fire Emblem history with a focus on high replayability and numerous secrets. Jump into a story crafted by a professional writer/novel seller.

name: Grand Theft Auto: Sindacco Chronicles
description: 1998. A new Mafia war is on the rise in Liberty City — the Sindacco, Forelli and Leone families are at their throats again for domination over the worst city in America. The Sindaccos, led by the ambitious Paulie Sindacco, plan to conquer what they can before the others can get their hands on what’s left of the city. A loyal henchman they have, Joseph Daniel O’Toole, is supposed to infiltrate the Leone Family. Meanwhile, Paulie’s two nephews, Frank and Marcus, are preparing their men for a big war…

name: Sludge Life: The Big Mud Sessions
description: Chop it up with BIG MUD and crew to get small glimpse of what went down prior to the events of SLUDGE LIFE 2.

name: Secret Manga Girlfriend
description: You are an aspiring manga artist with a dream of working alongside the rising star of the most popular weekly manga magazine. When the most popular girl at school, who turns out to be the very star, offers you the chance of a lifetime to be her assistant, you think your dreams have come true. But as you work with her, you begin to question her motives and navigate complicated emotions, while your childhood friend struggles with academic perfection and becomes distrustful of your new mentor. With the arrival of a new doujin artist who pushes your creative boundaries, you must choose between following your heart or pursuing your dreams!

name: Incident at Grove Lake
description: A PSX Style adventure game based on accounts of Alien Abductions. Intended to be played in one sitting.

name: Learn Katakana!!
description:
Learn Katakana!! is an educational game that helps you memorize the advanced Japanese syllabary typically used for the transcription of the foreign words, Katakana.

Learn Katakana by playing a game! Select the correct spelling of each Katakana character from the 4 options and score points. Attain the highest possible score with 3 lives!

The game features 46 Katakana characters and you can always remind yourself how to read them by using the table in the game.

name: Dungeon & Tales: Warriors and Dragons
description: Immerse yourself in an exciting world with this innovative interactive fantasy novel! Which path will you take? You decide the destiny and the end of the story!

name: Furries & Scalies: Super Scary Halloween Spooky Times - Final Boss
description: Adds a new customer and a new mechanic.

name: Pinball FX: Honor and Legacy
description: Fight for Honor and cement your Legacy on these timeless Zen Originals! Seek vengeance in feudal Japan or relive the adventures of one of the best-selling novels of Jules Verne.

name: Pinball FX: Williams Pinball - Whirlwind️
description: Storm Alert! Blow away the highest scores on Williams Pinball: Whirlwind️ while battling the elements and capturing the wonders of our powerful nature.

name: Pixel Puzzles Traditional Jigsaws: Native American
description: Pixel Puzzles, your number one place for digital jigsaws.

name: Roots Need Control 3.0: Roots Need Chungnam 8.7
description: Protect the root flower. Something unexpected happens. Here in Chungcheongnam-do.

name: DCS World: Sinai Map
description: The DCS: Sinai map is focused on the Sinai Peninsula, located between the Gulf of Suez and the Gulf of Aqaba with eastern Egypt to the west and southern Israel to the east. Since ancient times, it has been a strategic location rich in resources, nature, religion, and history.

name: Tentacle Prawn: (Actually) A Cthulhu Dating Sim - Huge Manatees
description: Adds two new pages of classes to attend.

name: Ruins Story
description: High-speed movement, aiming, and shooting with one finger operation! High tempo battle! Use unlocked items to come up with new builds and strategies each time you explore.

name: Shimazu
description: Shimazu is a side-scrolling action/dark art style game. Take on the role of a samurai named Shimazu, who's son is kidnapped and his wife is killed by an evil demon called Takeda with help from another demon called Fudo.

name: 100 Doors Game: Dasshutsu Game
description: A room escape adventure developed by Peaksel.

name: Arcade Archives: Bravoman
description: Here comes Bravoman, an agent of justice!

name: Monster Hunter Rise: Bonus Update
description: The Sunbreak story reaches its epic conclusion as you face off with the ancient elder dragon, Primordial Malzeno in the Bonus Update!

name: Sunny Girl
description: Enjoy cute girls in the background of gentle music and complete puzzles. The game is a jigsaw puzzle, where players move puzzle pieces to restore the original image.

name: A Whisper in the Twilight: Chapter One
description: An ancient moon shrouded in mystery. Alien enigmas. An adventure beyond the Earth.

name: Alien Protection
description: In this exciting game, you become a brave space traveler who finds himself on an alien planet after your spaceship breaks down.

name: Destruct Blocks
description: Destruct Blocks is an addictive isometric puzzle game that combines strategic thinking, block destruction, and color matching challenges. Navigate a shape composed of colored blocks through intricate levels, strategically demolishing target blocks while avoiding others.

name: Dr. Carlos' Personality Exam
description: It's a nice sunny day in Dubai, and you decide to wander into the shady clinic of Dr. Carlos PhD. Once inside, you are tasked with answering questions that will reveal your true nature...

name: Carnival in the Hut
description: There are ingredients on the level that you have to drag into the pot. Drag into the pot: eggs, oil, water in a bucket, flour in a bag, and dough.

name: Walkabout Mini Golf: Journey to the Center of the Earth
description: A new course themed after the Jules Verne story.

name: Angel Symphony
description: Comical shooting in which angels fight!

name: Lonely Path
description: Lonely Path is a relaxing puzzle game where you move and stacks tiles to create paths through 5 nature themed, hand-drawn regions! Try your hand at 100 different levels or make your own and share them with the community!

name: Zortch
description: Meet Zortch Maxinum: short order cook, amateur engineer and professional slacker; Bored and tired of her day job she decides to go on a holiday but alas she picks a cheap option: turns out it's a scheme by aliens who capture humans to eat their brains! also this game is a sci-fi horror comedy fps

name: Labyrinth of Axarith
description: Players make adventurers and challenge numerous labyrinths, and mix good old 3D exploration dungeons, real-time battles, and card-like choices in this RPG.

name: Speed Crew
description: A hilarious party game that focuses on chaotic cooperation between players. The task of the pit crew is to inspect arriving cars and perform quick repair services while navigating intricate levels. To succeed and beat their bitter rival, players must help each other and build tactics for each race.

name: MotoGP 23
description: Warm up the engines and break the boundaries between game and reality. The new chapter of your beloved franchise is back with the Official 2023 Championship and a Renewed Career with Rivalries to manage and Turning Points to move faster through the different classes. A new level of realism with the Dynamic Weather and the Flag to Flag will test your skill and strategy, and the multiplayer fun is now enriched more than ever with the cross-play, the new ranking races and the return of the 2-player local split-screen. But that’s not all! Now everyone can be the next champion, thanks to the new neural riding system and the MotoGP Academy.

name: Pro Cycling Manager 2023
description: Manage a team of professional cyclists: control the budget, recruit young talent, train riders and devise race strategies. Jostle for position to reach the top of the world rankings!

name: Tour de France 2023
description: Ride shoulder to shoulder with the best cyclists and show your panache to triumph on the Champs-Elysées in the official video game of the Tour de France 2023! Compete in mountain or flat stages and experience all the action of the Grande Boucle.

name: Harmony: The Fall of Reverie
description: The fate of humanity is at stake. Use your gift of clairvoyance to see into the future and stop an apocalypse that threatens the balance between your world and the deities'.

name: Bleak Sword DX
description: Discover and destroy increasingly horrifying creatures across an oppressive lofi world, wielding fierce weaponry and powerful magic in this pocket-sized action adventure.

name: Gridpunk
description: Gridpunk is a dynamic top-down action shooter set in a vibrant cyberpunk universe, offering both solo and multiplayer experiences. Players can engage in various game modes, including 2v2, 3v3, 5v5, and Battle Royale formats, each demanding quick reflexes and strategic gameplay. The game features a diverse roster of heroes, each equipped with unique abilities and playstyles, allowing for personalized combat strategies. A robust gear system enables players to collect, merge, and upgrade equipment, enhancing their heroes' capabilities and tailoring their builds to suit their preferred tactics. With its fast-paced real-time battles and immersive cyberpunk aesthetics, Gridpunk delivers an adrenaline-fueled gaming experience that challenges players to outwit and outmaneuver opponents in a futuristic arena.

name: Ecchi Beauties 2
description: Ecchi Beauties is the perfect Waifu puzzle game. Enjoy our beauftiful girls in 24 images in the gallery after you unlocked them in the game. The Gallery itself is easy controllable.

name: The Divine Speaker: The Sun and the Moon
description: The story-rich 18+ prequel to The Divine Speaker. Follow alongside a younger Aemyl as he uncovers the world for himself!

name: Mask of the Rose
description: A marvellous romance with a hint of murder. Lose your heart to a stolen city in this game of amorous intrigue! Seek love, for yourself or your friends. Help a murdered man find justice. And watch out for the bats.

name: Anarchy: Wolf's Law
description: The constant struggle for control of the territory between living people, but in singleplayer mode. A dynamic shooter with elements of RPG and economic thinking.

name: Miles of Cubes
description: Cruise through miles and miles of cubes. You are driving through miles and miles of cubes, avoid obstacles, crash through barriers and collect orbs!

name: Voidigo
description: Voidigo is a chaotic and colorful roguelite shooter with a focus on dynamic and unique boss fights. Equip the many weapons and powerups to fight back the void corruption throughout the worlds. Hunt or be hunted.

name: Undead Citadel
description: Wreak havoc through the undead plague and feel like a real badass in this unique physics-based medieval combat title. Ruthlessly cut, stab, smash, shoot or blow up your foes with a large variety of melee and ranged weapons as you explore the cursed citadel.

name: Distance and Mirage
description:
Laurel disappeared when the two of you were just stupid kids, playing out past your curfew. The thing at the molten heart of the desert?

It knows something.

name: Olivia's Bad Day
description: Olivia's had the worst day at work. Do whatever it takes to give her some much needed stress-relief.

name: Honkai: Star Rail - Galactic Roaming
description:
Version 1.1 of Honkai: Star Rail, which included:
• New characters: Luocha, Silver Wolf and Yukong
• New area: Belobog - History and Culture Museum
• New companion missions for Silver Wolf, Luocha, Yanqing and Bailu
• New main event: Starhunt Game
• …and more!

name: The Experiment
description: A 21 level megawad for Doom II

name: Green Guy Goes Grappling 2
description: Green Guy Goes Grappling 2 is a super fast-paced platformer with a grappling hook released for desktop on June 7th, 2023.

name: Sex Simulator: Futanari BDSM
description: An interactive sex simulation game featuring visual novel elements, high definition graphics and videos, and realistic-looking characters set in a beautiful decor. You play the role of an experienced Futanari Dominatrix who initiates three curious women into the world of BDSM sex.

name: Theatrhythm: Final Bar Line - Chrono: Pack Vol. 2
description: A pack of additional music tracks to use with Theatrhythm Final Bar Line.

name: Monster Hunter Rise: Kamura Collection DLC Pack
description:
Enhance your Monster Hunter Rise experience with this DLC pack featuring three Kamura characters for you to use as your hunter’s appearance and voice!

The following is included in this content:

- "Utsushi" Hunter layered armor set
- "Hinoa" Hunter layered armor set
- "Minoto" Hunter layered armor set
- Hunter Voice: Master Utsushi
- Hunter Voice: Hinoa the Quest Maiden
- Hunter Voice: Minoto the Hub Maiden

name: Monster Hunter Rise: Cute & Cuddly Collection DLC Pack
description:
Enhance your Monster Hunter Rise experience with this DLC pack full of cute add-ons!

This additional content includes:

- "Lance Gunn" Hunter layered armor set
- "Ran Page" Hunter layered armor set
- "Kit T." Palico layered armor set
- "Pup R." Palamute layered armor set
- "Special Stickers 3" sticker set
- "Stuffed Rathalos" Hunter layered weapon
- "Stuffed Nargacuga" Hunter layered weapon
- "Stuffed Zinogre" Hunter layered weapon
- "Stuffed Goss Harag" Hunter layered weapon
- "Stuffed Malzeno" Hunter layered weapon
- "Stuffed Magnamalo" Hunter layered weapon
- "Stuffed Diablos" Hunter layered weapon
- "Stuffed Tigrex" Hunter layered weapon
- "Stuffed Lunagaron" Hunter layered weapon
- "Stuffed Garangolm" Hunter layered weapon
- "Stuffed Rakna-Kadaki" Hunter layered weapon
- "Stuffed Khezu" Hunter layered weapon
- "Stuffed Mizutsune" Hunter layered weapon
- "Stuffed Rajang" Hunter layered weapon

name: Monster Hunter Rise: Kingdom Collection DLC Pack
description:
Enhance your Monster Hunter Rise experience with this DLC pack featuring three Elgado characters for you to use as your hunter’s appearance and voice!

This additional content includes:

- "Fiorayne" Hunter layered armor set
- "Rondine" Hunter layered armor set
- "Arlow" Hunter layered armor set
- Hunter Voice: Fiorayne
- Hunter Voice: Rondine the Trader
- Hunter Voice: Arlow

name: Dungeon Breakout: Chapter 1
description: A short dungeon crawler rpg where you have to fight your way through enemies and solve puzzles to find your way home.

name: Sands of Salzaar: The Ember Saga
description: This DLC contains 3 content expansions: "Ember Workshop", "Child Rearing" and "Among Legends: Xin Qi Ji", and they can be independently loaded/removed in the game.

name: Hatsune Miku: The Planet of Wonder and Fragments of Wishes
