description: Miku and friends crash land on a mysterious planet during their space journey... There they meet many unique characters! Play all kinds of games to grant everybody's wishes! Contains nine minigames including the previously released Amiguru Jump and Amiguru Train.

name: Do Not Crash
description: Drive your car to avoid obstacles and cars chasing you. Crash the cars and collect coins to buy a new whip.

name: Rocket League: Season 11
description:
Perched high above the seaside, a group of drift cars in tuning mode wait for the signal. At the whistle, a chaotic descent begins, for a festival of tight skids on these perilous mountain roads. Below, cheers are heard: a delirious crowd admires its favorite pilots to boost to victory. This is what you should expect in Season 11.

We hope you are well, as the festivities will rage on throughout the season. Drift with the famous Nissan Silvia (S13), immerse yourself in a colorful Rocket Pass and celebrate the best soccar moments in the Estadio Vida arena.

So, ready to light the fire? Season 11 begins on June 7!

name: Grime: Tinge of Terror
description: Enjoy a New Game + mode featuring revamped enemies and bosses, endless progression, and a terrifying secret boss!

name: Base of War
description: Base of War is a next generation 4x RTS game.

name: Viking Heroes 4
description: Join the Viking heroes in a race against time to save the world from eternal darkness. As the sun and moon falter and Fenrir threatens to consume them, the Vikings must travel across realms to forge a magical chain that can capture him.

name: Disney Dreamlight Valley: The Remembering
description: In the biggest story update yet, uncover the mystery of the Forgetting in the Forgotten Lands Biome with help from a magical resident of the mysterious Pumpkin House. Journey through the Dreamscape—the dimension between Dreams and Reality—and experience epic story Quests alongside your Disney and Pixar friends in the Valley.

name: Arcana: Heat and Cold. Stories
description: The events surrounding the unskilled magician are heating up! Could an unusual way of curing the Arcane Fever have caused such a stir?! Or have we accidentally become involved in a story whose scale we cannot yet comprehend!? Comedy, hentai scenes, and new hilarious adventures await you.

name: Edmund and Eliza
description: Edmund and Eliza is a medieval action adventure game about a knight named Edmund Dantes who ventures into a mysterious village in search of a merchant's missing daughter named Eliza Bonteri. Edmund and Eliza is a senior design capstone project for California State University of Northridge.

name: Starlights
description: Starlights is a visual novel focusing on the character Fletcher. It tells a story of a protagonist who had to move schools because of an unforeseen circumstance. At the new school, he meets Fletcher, his roommate, and the story between Fletcher and the protagonist begins.

name: Battle of Zama
description: Battle of Zama is a video game about one of the most important battles in history. Scipio from Rome’s Army met Hannibal’s Army on the battlefield in Carthage. Battle of Zama is inspired by old Avalon Hill and SPI games.

name: Reasoning of Courage Nori 3 Balanced Diet
description:
The boy, courage, solves the mystery of miso soup
solve!

name: Finding Fate
description: A hidden object game following the journalist Fate, in her quest to uncover the truth and her own past.

name: Steam Engine Simulator
description: On January 21, 2023, AngeTheGreat released a video called "Simulating a Steam Engine with C++" which documented the creation of a simple steam engine simulation. This is that simulation now made into a simple game! Enjoy operating and listening to your own miniature virtual steam engine.

name: Brain Show
description: Compete with your friends in brand new quiz game. Take part in crazy TV Show. Dynamite explosions, sobbing mates, ruined friendships! Sounds like fun? It will be – with Brain Show!

name: Arcade Classics
description: Collection of a few arcade classics, remade with a fresh and friendly looking art style and a beautiful soundtrack.

name: Minecraft: Trails & Tales
description: Minecraft: Trails & Tales is an update for Minecraft: Bedrock Edition with its theme being "creativity and self-expression through representation and storytelling", focusing mostly on decorative blocks, customization options, and resources for player-driven in-game storytelling and roleplay. It also adds new passive mobs, an archaeology system, and the cherry grove biome.

name: Minecraft: Trails & Tales
description: Minecraft: Trails & Tales is an update for Minecraft: Java Edition with its theme being "creativity and self-expression through representation and storytelling", focusing mostly on decorative blocks, customization options, and resources for player-driven in-game storytelling and roleplay. It also adds new passive mobs, an archaeology system, and the cherry grove biome.

name: Chest
description: The story of Chest is about Capulet, who has forgotten how to undo the spell after having transformed into a Chest for a time until found by Zong. Having turned back human with Zong's help, Capulet then decided to go on the quest to help those who have also turned into chests.

name: Blightlands Blacksmith
description: Blightlands Blacksmith is a medieval fantasy blacksmithing simulator with exploration and combat elements. Mine, smelt, forge, assemble, grind, and rune-craft weapons to supply a legion cohort, and defend yourself as you delve into the mine for new materials. The cohort's success depends on you.

name: Nocturnal
description: After years of traveling, Ardeshir finds his native island covered in a mysterious fog. Carve your way with fire and steel to find out what happened to your people in this action-platformer game. You’re the only one who can discover the secrets that lie beyond the Mist.

name: R.O.O.T.
description: This story is about a corporation named RavenTech, set in the near future. R.O.O.T.

name: Dungeonrite
description: Dungeonrite is a First Person Dungeon Crawler inspired by the classic RPG's of the 90's. Level up your characters and gear them with the best loot you can buy (or find) as you navigate your way through perilous dungeons filled with enemies and puzzles.

name: Espresso Tycoon
description: Espresso Tycoon - a coffee shop simulator. Create your brand, decorate the coffee shop, manage your employees, and take care of your customers. Use the 3D coffee editor to create coffee recipes, order supplies, and collect rating points. Build the whole coffee business and complete all the missions!

name: Rogue Dungeon
description: Based on the board game, Rogue Dungeon is a solo dungeon crawler. It plays like an old-school roguelike, using hand management, card draw and dice rolling as primary game mechanics. Players will need to figure out how best to use their hero abilities, skills, items, experience and luck to survive.

name: Quantaar
description: Quantaar is a fast-paced VR hero melee combining first & third-person view. Players can experience the intensity of melee combat, develop unique play styles, or just meet new friends at bars!

name: Killing Floor 2: Horzine Diver Outfit Bundle
description: Comes with the Horzine Diver Outfit, Helmet, and Backpack (includes 6 of skin styles). Compatible with most characters.

name: Warp Cinema
description: Warp Cinema is a bite-size text-parser adventure game made for Adventure Jam 2023 and takes about 10-15 minutes to play through.

name: Killing Floor 2: S12 Shockgun Weapon Bundle
description: A semi-automatic shotgun with a penchant for electrically enforced social distancing. The S12 Shockgun is designed for the Support perk and comes with 5 unique skin variants.

name: Immortal Road Battle
description: Immortal Road Battle "is a game with a pure theme of cultivating immortals. With gorgeous graphics, rich storylines, and unique cultivation style, it reinterprets the era of leisure combat and fulfills your dream of wielding a sword to travel the world.

name: The Immortal Beloved 2
description: You were a miss in the manor, but an accident completely disrupted the trajectory of your life... When the whole world is falling, where do you go in the face of the terrible truth and the unknown future?

name: Placid Plastic Duck: Hippospace Download
description: With this additional location, you'll enjoy a funfair experience in space, a lazy river of lights, and a calm, solitary ride in orbit. Come check the cockpit and meet 3 special spatial ducks!

name: Tennis Esports
description:
Welcome to Tennis Esports, the virtual tennis application that combines the excitement of virtual reality tennis with the competition and fun of tennis. Play with real tennis swings, and immerse yourself in the ultimate world of virtual sports from virtually anywhere.

Tennis Esports is as realistic as virtual sports gets, replicating all the spins and swings you can even enhance your experience with a VR Tennis handle! For beginner players wanting to give tennis a go, to amateur tennis fans and avid players, Tennis Esports is a fun and useful tool to learn and enjoy tennis at any level from your school, office or home!

Build up your skills and compete in live matches, and climb the global rankings on the Tennis Esports Tour, challenge yourself with MirrorPlay, or become addicted to the excitement of HitEmAll, our famous arcade tennis target game.

With Tennis Esports you can play in a stadium, on any surface with a small or a big space. Get fit playing running mode against our AI opponents or enable voice chat with Instant and Custom match play. Set up your own player profile and create your own virtual tennis avatar where you can see your skills, unlock prizes and represent your country!

Tennis Esports is for gamers, tennis players and sports fans of all ages. Join the Tennis Esports community on Discord to find players and keep up to date with competitions, find friends, opponents and win prizes!

name: The Barkless Doctrine
description: After being woken up by a mysterious phone call from her most important relative, Val goes on a journey through the busy streets of NYC, the seedy political underbelly of Washington D.C., and the dark suburbia on the periphery of the American dream. Can the two twin-aunts stop General Wagmore Barkless before it’s too late?

name: Firebloo Girls
description: Sin descripción

name: The One Way Challenge
description: A platformer game where you can only move forward, left and right. You play as a ball rolling through levels and getting through obstacles. Seemingly nothing is wrong at least.

name: Draw and Color: Kawaii - GOTY Edition
description: Draw and Color: Kawaii - GOTY Edition is your path into the world of adorable delicacies! Use different drawing tools and have some tasty fun!

name: Dickland: Horror Quest
description: Dickland: Horror Quest is a 2D quest, the main features of which are: black humor and graphics drawn with an ordinary pencil in an album and scanned afterwards. In the game you will find a lot of different puzzles, dangers and puzzles that you have to solve.

name: Boreal Tenebrae Deluxe: Special Edition
description: Boreal Tenebrae will take you on a retro-style adventure, with a mysterious atmosphere and horror elements. The game is inspired by 90s classics and the best TV series.

name: SwapStar
description: Make patterns to gain energy. Spend energy to do actions. Plan your actions carefully to destroy your opponent's grid before they do yours. Play as Swapster in Story Mode or as any of the 10 colorful cast of characters in Mission or Versus Mode.

name: City Legends: The Ghost of Misty Hill - DLC
description: The doors of medical institutions often hide terrible secrets and outrageous accidents. Don't let ghosts get in the way between you and your search for answers!

name: Time Raiders
description: Delve deep and explore the vast eastern undergrounds. Treasures? Monsters? Who knows what awaits you...

name: Sky is Arrows: Dragon Bracer Item Chest
description: The Sky Is Arrows - Dragon Bracer Item Chest DLC unlocks 6 completely new, unique, and groundbreaking items. The player can use these items to enhance their current playstyle or create new strategies. It's up to the player to determine which items are the best from the random options given.

name: Coda
description: Sidescroller for Playdate Console with Rhythm-based Puzzles

name: C.H.A.I.N.G.E.D.
description:
The antichrist has won, the world has ended.
Time to make some choices.

name: CSS Room Escape
description: Can you escape the room in this difficult but fun challenge?

name: If: Walls Could Answer
description: What if walls could answer? Whatever that means, you’ll explore the memories of a neurotic scientist resolving puzzles that could help his mental state, discovering different endings of his life.

name: Square Inertia
description: Try to set the fastest times possible in Square Inertia: a fast-paced, momentum-based precision platformer. Race against the clock to improve your own personal best times and beat the author times set for each level.

name: Their Land
description: Their Land is an action-adventure first-person game with puzzles and an exciting story to experience. You play Jeremy, a 19 year old orphan who explores an untrodden island with his much older and more experienced friends. Will you fall victim to this fabled lands many perils?

name: Barkelona
description: An immersion-style game for Spanish learners

name: City Legends: The Ghost of Misty Hill - Collector's Edition
description: The most gruesome incidents often occur in medical institutions, the doors of which hide terrible secrets and unexplained incidents. Can you handle the darkest secrets of Misty Hill?

name: The Rumble Fish 2: Deluxe Edition
description: The Deluxe Edition includes the game plus 3 additional DLCs: Hazama, Beatrice and Greed!

name: Sandtrix
description: Blocks turn into sand. Clear pixels by lining up the same continous color from left to right.

name: Break Stuff VR
description:
Break Stuff in VR!! Smash for cash as a game show contestant. Throw and bash your way to victory!

Throw virtual objects in the visually stunning and exciting stages! Demolish an office construction site. Wreck a country parking lot. Crash apart a carnival. Shatter a china shop.

Swing baseball bats and sticks to break cool things! Bash away at fax machines and piñatas. Crush a showcase of expensive objects. Smash a fully destructible car!!

Have fun destroying virtual objects without the real clean up or consequences!
All ages and experiences levels. Easy to play, difficult to master.
Fun for everyone!

name: Autopista
description: Autopista is a car racing game inspired by 80s toys.

name: Unmatched: Digital Edition - Soho
description:
Soho - home to Mr. Edward Hyde, leap from rooftops and work the range to your advantage!

This DLC unlocks Soho - a map for both 1v1 and 2v2 games!

name: Shovel Knight: Pocket Dungeon - Puzzler's Pack DLC
description: This DLC adds new characters, areas, quests, relics, and more.

name: Melancholy Date
description: Have you ever felt like you were drowning in sadness, and the only way to stay afloat was to hold onto someone else's hand? Melancholy Date is the story of my journey through depression, and the search for love amidst the melancholy.

name: Tamagoneko
description: Get off the tree and face the world full of saws, pits and spikes in this hardcore 2D platformer about the nimble white Cat. Make your way through wild plains, thorny deserts and crystal caverns on a challenging yet exciting journey to rescue the lost kitten eggs!

name: Squeen's Adventure 3: Across The Cosmos
description:
The "threequal" (Is that a word?) to one of the best games known to man! (Don't look that up)

​After finally completing his adventure, Squeen's spaceship is fully working without any problems! That is until a rouge asteroid knocks into his ship and his Light-Jump Reactor breaks off and plunges into a nearby black hole. With no way to get back home, Squeen must travel across the universe in search of the parts of the reactor, fix it, and finally go home and charge his phone!

name: Cosmogonic
description: Cosmogonic is a 10 minute interactive science fiction animated short. It is the first VR experience inspired by the famous Polish science-fiction writer Stanisław Lem. This adaptation of a 1964 novel speaks perfectly to today’s world, where populism and disinformation threaten democracy.

name: Ornament Express
description: Investigate strange oddities in Ornament Express, where you're hired to recover your client's belongings from an eccentric thief and his train of stolen artifacts. Explore a cabinet of curiosities throughout the train, visit carts holding odd puzzles, odder objects and find hidden away secrets.

name: Raiden III x Mikado Maniax: Deluxe Edition
description: Deluxe Edition includes: The game, Digital Soundtrack (download code) plus a Mini Poster!

name: Amnesia: The Bunker
description: Amnesia: The Bunker is a first-person horror game set in a desolate WW1 Bunker. Face the oppressing terrors stalking the dark corridors. Search for and use the tools and weapons at your disposal, while keeping the lights on at all costs. Overcome fear, persevere, and make your way out alive.

name: PlayDaPon
description: The classic 16-bit action puzzle game brought to your playdate in vivid 1-bit color

name: Loop8: Celestial Edition
description:
‘Celestial’ Limited Edition includes:
- The game in a custom box
- 5.25”x7.25” softcover artbook with over 50 pages
- A musical selections CD
- 7” x 10.5” mini wall scroll
- Authentic 4” x 3.15” Japanese wooden ema

name: Search and Rescue
description: Turn-based, strategy board game for up to 4 Players! Search, Rescue and Survive!

name: Beyond the Evil
description: Beyond the Evil is an psychological horror game that places the player to a hard experience to find who created one supposed plague that might doom the world.

name: Diablo IV
description: Endless demons to slaughter. Deep customization through Talents, Skill Points, Runes, and Legendary loot. Randomized dungeons contained in a dynamic open world. Survive and conquer darkness—or succumb to the shadows.

name: Fantasy Sino-Japanese War
description: You unfortunately passed through the Sino-Japanese War, and became the Admiral of the North Sea Navy in the Qing Dynasty. What is more unfortunate is that this is not a history you are familiar with. This is an era when magic replaces machinery. Can you lead your army to achieve the final victory?

name: CityDriver: Moruga Turbo
description: Expand your car fleet in CityDriver with the Moruga Turbo DLC. This sleek SUV with 550 horsepower and a 0-100 km/h sprint in 4 seconds will have you whizzing through downtown Munich. The Moruga Turbo has room for 4 people and 4 suitcases, while its powerful combustion engine and automatic transmission make for an exhilarating driving experience. Discover the true meaning of power and style with this SUV DLC!

name: Black Cat: Back Light
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Cosmic Heist Plus
description:
"Fierce The "Bandit King" returns once again and has gotten himself roped into a full scale invasion of the world he dwells in!

As he was trying to catch some Zs after defeating Plague and trapping him inside a giant jewel from his previous outing, he is ambushed by an intimidating android who makes off with his jewel and witnesses a horrific space station looming in the sky.

As Fierce (Now joined by his trusty partner in crime - Moofie The Chu-Chu Snake) tries to find out what the cosmic heck is going on he sees a girl getting captured by a drone guard, perhaps she will know what's the deal about these invading jerks and help get his treasure back!"

name: That's a Cow: Definitive Edition
description:
Soar through the air and don't get milked in this cute game.
Jet udders

You are an animal rocket. Launch yourself and don't get shot down.

New goodies every hour

Play with the claw machine every hour, or after flying through enough levels. Get a new look for the cow with different headgear or projectiles.

Fly and shoot

name: Club Suicide: Complete Edition
description: Club Suicide: Complete Edition is a remastered version of the anti-romanticism otome game with fully remastered visuals and a completely remade BGM with newly added pieces, an additional scenario for each route, a completely new route, and two additional endings.

name: Mahjong Travel
description: Journey into the world of mahjong! Colorful locations, pleasant music and interesting levels will meet you on your way!

name: RockTop
description: Rock Top VR game is an online gameplay that adds multiplayer chase to traditional VR climbing gameplay. In addition to conquering different terrains, players can also play different roles in multiplayer mode to obtain more gems

name: Striker Zone
description: Join in with friends in a online shooter about modern warfare!

name: Tower Walker - The Ancient Ones
description: Tower Walker - The Ancient Ones adds exclusive bonus content. 6 new ancient playable races with special and unique racial traits.

name: CityDriver: Alvarez-Lentz Marathon 420 CTI
description: Expand your vehicle fleet by the first ever Van in the history of CityDriver: The Alvarez-Lentz Marathon 420 CTI!

name: X-Plane 12: Aerosoft - Airport Marseille
description: Marseille XP includes a custom replica of the LFML Marseille airport, extensively created to provide an authentic flight experience. In collaboration with ShortFinalDesign, FSS AG has brought another important airport to the X-Plane world.

name: DZ & Riggy vs. the Worlds II
description:
The follow-up to DZ and Riggy vs the World(s), the two aforementioned heroes have transitioned from platformer to RPG and must now save Earth from being taken over by a video game villain that is very personal to the two who has come to life!

DZ and Riggy must traverse through various game worlds such as Final Fantasy VI, Kirby, Pokemon, Super Mario, and many more to rescue their friends and save the day.

name: MiniBong
description: "MiniBong" is a lightweight rogue-like game that focuses on dress-up DIY and idle gameplay, while incorporating elements of combat, character development, and strategy.. You can feel the charm of dressing up and fighting at the same time.

name: Old Town Bus Simulator
description: Old Town Bus Simulator is a unique and immersive game that lets you experience the thrill of being a bus driver in the heart of a city's historic district.

name: Diablo IV: Ultimate Edition
description: Endless demons to slaughter. Deep customization through Talents, Skill Points, Runes, and Legendary loot. Randomized dungeons contained in a dynamic open world. Survive and conquer darkness—or succumb to the shadows.

name: I am your President: Prove Yourself Scenario
description: Immerse yourself in a serious political story and experience how you became president of the USA.

name: Nature Escapes 3
description: Nature Escapes 3 is fun, relaxing, and beautiful hidden object game!

name: Cadence Cuties
description: Rock out with one hand in this stunning rhythm game! Choose from exciting J-pop songs or groove to your own imported beat. Feast your eyes on exquisite girls and animations while the music takes you away.

name: Get Your Tentacles Off My Waifu
description: Tentacle monsters have taken pony waifus hostage. It's your job to save them all through extreme violence, achieve pony zen, do Stardust responsibly, and don't think about the meaning of one guy’s war against the universe. Or why cats. This is an accessible cute 'em up after all!

name: The Lancaster Leak: O'Brien State Park
description: An FBI intern leaked special investigation tapes before suddenly disappearing. The first tape of the series contains found footage from O'Brien State Park revealing the true events that were covered up in the 1980s.

name: Secrets of the Witch House
description: Secrets of the Witch House is a challenging, procedurally generated, permadeath, action roguelike. Encounter fierce monsters, dark secrets, devastating weapons and pachinko as you wage war against an ancient evil.

name: The Elder Scrolls Online: Necrom
description: Traverse the Telvanni Peninsula in Morrowind and preserve secrets ascribed to the unfathomable realms of Apocrypha. Unlock the runic power of a brand-new class - the Arcanist - and fight to uphold reality itself.

name: Koihana Bakumeiroku
description: Koihana Bakumeiroku is a romance game developed by CYBIRD x Animate co-production. It is the first title under the new brand +ONE by Ikémen Series.

name: CityDriver
description: Explore the streets of Munich in CityDriver and experience driving like never before. Choose from a variety of realistic vehicles including electric cars, SUVs and sports cars. Test your driving skills in an authentic environment with landmarks and historic buildings, as well as AI vehicles and pedestrians. There are several kilometres of city streets, motorways and highways at your disposal, as well as various missions such as passenger transport or pick-up and delivery missions.

name: Eigengrau
description: A twist at every turn! Explore a colorful shoot 'em up with varied and diverse gameplay beyond the familiar shooting and dodging. Every situation, every enemy, and every boss offers a different handcrafted experience.

name: 0 World TD
description: 0 World TD is a 2d tower defence game with deep combat system, highly adjustable difficulty settings and many more features!

name: Repella Fella
description: Set in a future, post-apocalyptic Australia, Repella Fella tells the story of several characters as they work to change their position in the world. Shoot, stab, lie or maim your way through each problem as it presents itself.

name: No Rest for the Wicked
description: This is a point and click game. Made in 14 days for Adventure Jam 2023.

name: Tiny Thor
description: Tiny Thor is a classic Jump'n'Run that cleverly combines elements of action, puzzles and skill. The unique hammer-throwing action spellbinds players right from the start and acquires special superhuman abilities and upgrades as the game progresses.

name: Bugby
description: Bugby is a 3v3 team sport set in a magical forest. Each team tries to score the most points by carrying the Bugby ball into one of the many goals scattered about. Use the bouncy mushrooms, pits and platforms to traverse across the playground-like arena.

name: Princess Poffin and the Spider Invasion
description:
Princess Poffin and the Spider Invasion is a tiny adventure game made in one week for games made QVIIK.

The moth kingdom has been covered in spiderwebs! It's up to Poffin to find the spider responsible, and restore her kingdom to its former web-free glory!

name: Buildy Stacky 2
description: Construct towering structures with unconventional building segments, stabilize, detonate, shrink, grow, and stick segments with special powers, all while navigating increasingly difficult challenges in this wacky and brain-teasing game that will delight players of all ages and skill levels.

name: Exolotl: Zian
description: Zian the Exolotl need to save their planet from King Orion invasion Platform game adventure with 5 Exolotl Character which can be switch character, you can use it in each different level with special moving and ability.

name: Old Boy
description: Old Boy, your coffee is ready! Old Boy? Old Boy is sleeping, and at this moment he's dreaming that he's a young boy with incredible skills of being young! Yes, a young boy in full vigor, and believe it or not, he knows how to run and jump, and he even does it with some mastery.

name: Nanoforce: Tactical Surgeon Fighter
description: Climb into the cockpit of an overpowered micro unit and fight against an invisible treath that kill human race. progress through numerous ennemy waves, bosses across more than 7 levels with action, secrets and more !

name: Plague of Yamorn
description: Cleanse the infected in Plague of Yamorn, a 2D metroidvania. Explore the ruined town of Yamorn and uncover the secrets behind its downfall. Find and craft new equipment, offensive and defensive items. Exploit the plagues empowering properties to gain new powers and abilities.

name: Dogfights in SLZ
description: Smear the skies with pieces of alien spaceships in Dogfights in SLZ, an arcade shoot'em up with a challenging and addictive aerial combat game.

name: Long
description: Sin descripción

name: Explore Jam 3
description: Pack of non combat maps. Some puzzles, some platforming and a lot of exploration! In comparison with 2 previous Explore jam packs this one is leaning toward walking simulators with a lot of environmental storytelling.

name: Icarus: Interior Decorations Pack
description: This pack unlocks 12 Mineral Lamps and 5 different art frames for players to craft.

name: Metallic Men
description: Explore the cosmos as a metallic man who wants to find lots of cool looking crystals.

name: Echoes of You
description: Echoes of You is a point n click visual novel about leaving behind a loved one and remember them for life. Play as a Vivienne, a vampire, who decides to visit her girlfriend's house one last time.

name: Megankreuzstilette
description: It is a hack of Megaman 3 whose main novelty is the use of Megaman 3 Improvement.

name: Poop Killer 7
description: Poop Killer 7 is a sequel inspired by the trash horror movies of the 80's and 90's. Using references from the movie "Scary Movie" among others... Mixing horror and comedy creating a bizarre and funny experience.

name: Caislean: Paranormal
description: A dynamic survival-horror game featuring gadget setup and point-and-click sequences. Investigate the castle during the day and place cameras, sensors, and snares throughout the explored environment. Locate paranormal hotspots and read clues about countering enemies.

name: Pool Together
description: Take the plunge into endless fun and excitement with Pool Together - the ultimate pool game experience!

name: Kitten Island
description: In a land full of challenges, jumps, secret areas and meows. Play with a very special kitten. To win, break blocks, jump over other little animals, dodge dangerous spikes, and progress to the next level, all while traversing through diverse landscapes ranging from lush forests to icy glaciers and scorching deserts.

name: Falling Into Dreams
description: Can you uncover the secrets of Dreams?...Platform your way in the wildest nightmares imaginable to the bosses that remind you something about your past...But, to end it all you need to fight with s̷̉ŏ̸̤m̸̖̓ẽ̸̯ṱ̶̓h̴̗͝i̷̻͆ng that has been stuck in your brain for long, long time...

name: BirdsBorough: Town of Alchemy
description: Build and run your own alchemy store in the ominous town of BirdsBorough...

name: Umokay 64DS X: To Infinity And Beyond!
description: Sin descripción

name: Frontier Hunter: Costume Pack Season 3
description: After the empire invented the airship, people finally became able to fly across float continents and islands. Erza leads an exploration team to explore the savage frontier where the empire can’t reach. When they break through all difficulties and reaches the destination, what awaits them is...

name: Jigsaw Puzzle Pack: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate - Aliens
description: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: Street Fighter 6: Year 1 Ultimate Pass
description: The Year 1 Ultimate Pass includes 4 new characters, 3 outfits with colors 1-10 for the new characters, 2 additional stages and 7,700 Drive tickets (in-game currency).

name: Sport & Fun: Swimming - Premium Edition
description: Discover a new world of fun! Dive into Sport & Fun: Swimming and use your Joy-Con controllers to experience the cutest challenge in your life.

name: MLB Rivals
description:
Take your rivalries to the next level in MLB Rivals!

A new officially licensed MLB mobile game with the latest rosters and schedules!
Enjoy an MLB mobile game with improved graphics!
Dive into MLB 9 INNINGS RIVALS for a brand new gameplay experience.

name: Diablo IV: Crypt Hunter Pack
description: Start your hellish journey through Sanctuary with the Crypt Hunter pack. The Crypt Hunter pack includes the Liath Icehowl mount, two weapon skin cosmetics Beginning's End dagger, Protean Axe, and 800 Platinum.

name: Clear Mosaic
description: High-definition photography with traditional classic game gameplay, let's try this free game together!

name: Cool Kid Cody: Season 2 - Episode 09
description: Season 2 Episode 9: Perfect Pink! In the surreal nightmarescape of her grandmother's living room, Mini is faced with the person she's hurt the most: herself.

name: Ms Holmes: The Case of the Dancing Men Collector's Edition
description: When strange letters with dancing figures arrive just before an heiress mysteriously disappears, you know the similarities to your Uncle Sherlock’s old case are no mere coincidence. Can you crack the code and stop those behind the dancing men for good?

name: Vs. Imposter Alternated
description: Vs. Imposter Alternated is a mod for Friday Night Funkin' that is based on Among Us. The game is a fanmade variant of the Vs. Impostor mod. Each week is set in an alternate universe. Week 1 is based off if the cut character Blue was in the mod, and Week 2 is based on the Horse Wrangling mode from Among Us.

name: Kirby's Return to Dream Land Deluxe Memory Match-Up
description: Kirby's Return to Dream Land Deluxe Memory Match-Up is a web game by Nintendo made to promote Kirby's Return to Dream Land Deluxe.

name: Train Simulator: China Railways CR400BF
description: Board the China Railways CR400BF ‘Golden Phoenix’ from Just Trains for an exhilarating run along South West China High Speed.

name: Diener Dates
description:
The good news is that you have gotten the chance to take over a prestigious diner, in a delightful location somewhere in the Afterlife! The bad news is that you died.

Diener Dates tasks you with running the diner of your dreams, a diner you would die for (literally). Customise the interior, purchase different types of food and make friends or enemies with the local clientele! Oh, did I forget to mention the customers? There are 8 charming customers that will visit your store regularly, so make sure to treat them well.

May the odds be ever in your flavor.

name: Coffee Golf
description:
A small daily golf game to go with your morning coffee.
A new course every day. Sink the five holes in any order, using the fewest strokes possible. Share your flawless score with friends as you try to forget about all the lily pads you left in the water.

name: Myth
description: Myth is a puzzle horror multiplayer game that guarantees an intense and headache-inducing experience with friends. Why the headache, you ask? Well, let's just say the puzzles are so mind-bendingly hard, they should come with a complimentary bottle of aspirin!

name: Legacy Of The Legends
description:
A PSX Style, Horror, RogueLike, Adventure, MetroidVania Game Made By Digital Artisans Game Team

Available For Microsoft Windows, Linux, And MacOS

name: Street Fighter 6: Year 1 Character Pass
description:
Year 1 Character Pass
- 4 additional characters (Rashid, A.K.I., Ed, Akuma)
- 4 additional characters' colors: Outfit 1 Colors 3-10
- Purchase bonus: 4,200 Drive Tickets

name: Yuuma Game
description: A short Action-Puzzle Shoot-em-up Touhou fan game starring everyone's favourite gluttonous goat, Toutetsu Yuuma.

name: Eventide
description: A free noir/cyberpunk horizontal scrolling shoot 'em up. Gameplay inspired by late 80's / early 90's arcade shoot 'em ups.

name: Pandora's Box
description: A space themed arcade adventure in psychedelic pixel arts, collect coins to customize your ship color and background as you get through far away galaxies.

name: Press Axe
description: It's a game to find the legendary duck using a double-edged axe.

name: RuneShroom
description: RuneShroom is a 2D action platformer where you play as Mushu. You must journey forth! Armed with an array of hand animated spell to drive the snails who have decimated the your people's lands, and who now endanger the very diety who gave you life.

name: Dirty Room: Chapter 5
description: After knowing Dr. Q's whereabout, you rushed to an unknown graveyard...

name: Heretic’s Fork: Probation
description: Dear candidate, start your free probation period as manager of Hell! Punish sinners by using our deck-building system, constructing fiendish towers to manage underworld hordes. Good luck!

name: Street Fighter 6: Ultimate Edition
description: The additional content for the Ultimate Edition comes from the Year 1 Ultimate Pass which includes 4 new characters, 3 outfits with colors 1-10 for the new characters, 2 additional stages and 7,700 Drive tickets (in-game currency).

name: We Love Katamari REROLL+ Royal Reverie: Special Edition
description:
The second title in the Katamari Damacy series has returned in a remastered, powered-up version!

We Love Katamari REROLL+ Royal Reverie is a fully remastered version of We Love Katamari Damacy, originally released in 2005, with new and improved graphics and gameplay enhancements to make it easier to jump in and have fun.

The Special Edition contains We Love Katamari REROLL+ Royal Reverie, the Little Prince Costume, and the Katamari Damacy Series Music Bundle.

name: Cat Ping Pong
description: Cat Ping Pong is an arcade style ping pong game. The user controls a cat paddle to bat a yarn ball back and forth against its opponent. Use the meddling rat in the middle of the field to gain speed, and change trajectory of the ball to score on the opposing cat!

name: Isle of Jura Fishing Trip: Extended Edition
description: Visit the remarkable Isle of Jura and catch some delicious fish!

name: Breakfast Bar Tycoon: Co-op Edition
description:
It's almost time for breakfast! Go and prove that your breakfast bar deserves its fame!
Have you ever wondered what it’s like to run your own breakfast kitchen?
In Breakfast Bar Tycoon, you'll learn that it's no easy task!
You will take on the role of a breakfast bar manager and try your best to serve the hordes of hungry customers as quickly as possible.
Take orders, prepare dishes and fight for tips!

name: NoEvidence: Scary Horror Quest Survival Story
description: NoEvidence is an intense detective game where you investigate a murder. Navigate a dark environment using only your flashlight. Discover the murder location and prevent the crime. Use detective skills to find clues and important objects like a recorder, tapes, fuses, and a revolver. Solve puzzles and decipher codes to unlock doors and access key areas. With its immersive atmosphere, challenging quests, and gripping storyline, it's a must-play for detective game and thriller fans.

name: Crossing Damaged Bridge
description: Crossing Damaged Bridge is an exciting game designed for those who love extreme adventures. The game takes you on a thrilling journey, where the roads are full of potholes and obstacles.

name: Dwarfender
description: Dwarfender is an action-strategy fantasy game in third person, set traps to repel waves of angry golems ! Take control of Rigolain, a dwarf-engineer, ready for anything in the heat of battle !

name: Silent Paws
description: Explore a mystical world as a clever fox in this atmospheric walking simulator.

name: Frupu VR Fruit Punch
description: It is an action-based fighting fun game. Monster Mu throws fruits to you. He throws faster and faster, sometimes throwing multiple fruits at once. Punch the fruit at the right time and finish your fruit cocktail or the fruit will explode in your face. Caution: Don't let the toaster hit you.

name: Cell Machine Indev
description: Get ready for the ultimate 2D sandbox puzzle game experience with Cell Machine: Indev!

name: Zombie Ants VR
description: Zombie Ants VR is a short (5-10 minute) experience that takes the player through the life cycle of Ophiocordyceps, a fungus that drives creatures (in this case ants) to change their behavior in order to propagate the fungus and ultimately kills them.

name: Long
description: Will you be able to get out of this long corridor? A long road with death on the prowl will stand between you and the exit. There is no other way, you are already inside.

name: Diablo IV: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Diablo IV is the next-gen action RPG experience with endless evil to slaughter, countless abilities to master, nightmarish Dungeons, and legendary loot.

This is only the beginning for Diablo IV, with new events, stories, seasons, rewards, and more looming on the horizon.

name: Valiant: Or, Val's guide to having a broken vag
description: (val)iant is a single-player, browser-based narrative game about pelvic pain. Play as Val, a nonbinary college student struggling with their relationship to their body, as well as their relationship with sex. This game is fundamentally about how we as a society learn (or don't learn) about sex.

name: April's Diary
description: Help April, a young housekeeper in England during the Victorian era to clean up the many rooms in Lord Ashford's manor. Challenging and fun 3D puzzles with a match-3 element embedded.

name: Furry Milfs
description: Furry Milfs - is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: Age of the Duel
description: Duel your friends in multiple ages! Become the best duelist or spectate and place bets on who will win. Unlock cosmetics by winning rounds or winning bets! Race in the Roman era by launching yourself to the finish with explosives, compete in a rock kicking sport in the Medieval era, or battle with lasers in the Future era. This game is a multiplayer online game where two players will duel, and others can spectate and place bets on the victor. As duels finish, one of the spectators will be put in as the new competitor. With each age comes a completely new type of duel, you can change between the three ages and find your favorite way to battle.

name: Mirage
description: Jump through mystical desert ruins and shoot the bird-like guards to steal their treasure.

name: Drift Reign
description: Get ready to reign supreme in the ultimate drifting simulator - Drift Reign! Start as a street drifter, choose your car from USA, Japan, or Germany, and work your way up to the top. With realistic physics and deep customization options, this game will make you feel like a real pro-drifter.

name: Wizard's Watch
description: You are a wizard and your village is under attack! Push back the enemy forces with powerful spells. Burn, freeze, shatter and crush the enemy soldiers with your magic powers. Gain XP as you kill your enemies and unlock upgrades for your spells.

name: Wise Garden
description: Play as a gardener in Wise Garden, a puzzle game inspired by feudal Japan. Play with zen garden's elements and find your own solution to please your clients. Establish yourself as the best gardener.

name: Butchers Don't Surf!
description: Butchers Don't Surf! it's a challenging and fun game at the same time. In this game, the player launches the character from a cannon to reach goals, complete missions, release new characters and go around the world!

name: Street Fighter 6: Steelbook Edition
description: Get a nice steelbook cover with your Street Fighter 6 in this exclusive edition.

name: Street Fighter 6: Costume Color - Outfit 1 Color 10
description: Included as a pre-order bonus, this pack adds Outfit 1 Color 10 for Chun-Li, Jamie, Manon, Dee Jay, Juri, and Ken.

name: Dongeng Bayang Kulit
description: Dongeng Bayang Kulit is a turn-based RPG that is loosely based on Southeast Asian folklore. You play as the recently ship-less, Captain N'man and his mystical guide, Putri Matami as they travel in search for answers regarding a mysterious apparition that has taken to incessantly haunting N'man.

name: Street Fighter 6: Mad Gear Box
description:
The Mad Gear Box is the physical collector's edition of Street Fighter 6, it includes the mad gear box itself, Pop Up Parade Figures of Luke and Kimberly, the artbook, a sticker set, the Figure Diorama Board, a standard physical edition of the game and a code for the Year 1 Ultimate Pass.

The Year 1 Ultimate Pass includes 4 new characters, 3 outfits with colors 1-10 for the new characters, 2 additional stages and 7,700 Drive tickets (in-game currency).

name: Street Fighter 6: Lenticular Edition
description: The Lenticular Edition is a physical standard edition of the game that comes with a holographic key art sleeve designed to give a sense of depth and motion as the viewing angle changes.

name: Sugar Tanks
description: Sugar Tanks is an intense, fast-paced, and super sweet tank shooter game. It is fun, looks cute, is addicting, and is a hell of a lot more difficult at the end than you would imagine. Be ready for a colorful, caries-inducing bullet-hell twin-stick shooter like no other.

name: Search
description: Play as a Park Ranger in Dreary Lake Provincial Park and unravel the mysteries your coworkers are trying to keep hidden.

name: Street Fighter 6: Deluxe Edition
description:
Content
・Full Game
・Year 1 Character Pass

name: We Love Katamari Reroll + Royal Reverie
description:
We Love Katamari Reroll + Royal Reverie is a remaster of the PS2 game We Love Katamari.

The second title in the Katamari Damacy series has returned in a remastered, powered-up version! This new reroll comes with improved graphics and gameplay enhancements. In Royal Reverie, roll up katamari as the King of All Cosmos in his boyhood!

name: 99 Moves
description: Without a heading in the galaxy, all was lost because your energy was about to run out... gravity would chart the course of your destiny... Suddenly, V-99 entered a zone called Shaders, which provided energy... It was a new opportunity to survive. However, it was not all good news, as you only have 99 energy pulses to move through the Shaders zone.

name: Pile Up!
description: "Pile Up!" is a strategic building game which you need to build houses, fulfill your people’s requests and manage your risky buildings in different ways on a small land. But don’t let your guard down in this chill environment, we only get you relaxed so you destroy everything you did.

name: Astride
description: Explore Astride, a horse game set in a Scandinavian-inspired environment. Care for and train horses, reveal mysteries and more!

name: 7 Horizons
description: BOOM! Shoot your way to saving the galaxy in an epic quest beyond the 7th horizon. Exciting platform challenges with shooter elements – all with a comic book atmosphere, humor, and beautiful hand-drawn graphics!

name: Street Fighter 6
description:
The evolution of fighting games starts with our traditional Fighting Ground, and then we're turning the genre on its head with World Tour and Battle Hub for a total of three modes where anyone can play to their liking.

No one starts off as a champion. You get there step by step, punch by punch.
Take up the challenge and bring your game to the next level.

name: TrainingPeaks Virtual
description: TrainingPeaks Virtual is an online cycling platform that allows cyclists of all levels to train, race, and connect with others.

name: Arena Breakout: Season 1
description: The beginning of Arena Breakout.

name: Labyrinth Flowers
description: Etched in your memory, only a riddle remains. You, a budding adventurer, arrive in town to conquer this dungeon. The local adventurers’ guild wastes no time in evaluating your skills, then offers you a tantalizing proposal...!

name: Sunky the PC Port
description: An awesome parody of SONIC-PC (by JoeDoughBoi and John-Kun) in which Sunky needs to invite 1 more friend to start a DANCE PARTY!

name: Deimos' Endless Pursuit of Becoming Deimos: Part One
description: Sin descripción

name: Astrune Academy
description: A fantasy RPG of a tale of fighting magical girls!

name: Porter
description: In Porter, you play as Yug who may teleport and jump. If Yug teleports into a wall, Yug dies. If Yug jumps into spikes, Yug dies. The goal is to use Yugs teleportation and jump to get to the yellow coin in each level.

name: Limbus Company: Season 2 - Reminiscence
description:
Season 2: Reminiscence, is the second Season of Limbus Company.

It consists of the game's fourth Story Chapter (Canto IV: The Unchanging), the second Mirror Dungeon and Line 2 of Refraction Railway, as well as the release of 8 Identities based on story content and 6 E.G.O exclusive to the Season's Pass.

It also consists of the game's second Detour Tale, The Magic Hell Bus. This event adds an additional 2 Identities and 2 E.G.O to the season.

name: Infierno Rubí
description: Sin descripción

name: Tunnels of Terror!
description:
Something different is happening in the Galaxy: a mysterious cataclysmic event has caused several interdimensional tunnels to open in space, and you are the patrolman Jonas aboard the Twister of Central Command. Without connection and with intense lights invading your cabin, your only alternative is to destroy the ships that cross the tunnels of terror. Several levels and five different enemies alternate phases in a game with a breakneck pace in which you won’t have a minute of peace or it will be the end of you.
Embark on this odyssey…

name: Par for the Dungeon
description: Putt, explode and fight with everything from grapple hooks to laser beams and conquer over 100 increasingly puzzling levels!

name: Epic Roller Coasters: Kelimutu
description: Beautiful and colorful lakes at high altitude This DLC includes: - Roller coaster map: Kelimutu. - One roller coaster cart.

name: Chrono Crystal: Hubert
description: Chrono Crystal is a tower defense game. Spanning across 5 major regions with the Prince and facing numerous challenges, an unprecedented great war is about to break out. Build your towers, upgrade your heroes, and defend your crystal against waves of enemies—until the countdown timer runs out!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Yellowstone Mountain & Central Railroad
description: Set in the Yellowstone Mountains of Wyoming, this 55km long route offers a range of operations, including coal, iron ore, limestone, and steel. Complete with four sessions and a multiplayer session, there is plenty to explore on this route.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Yellowstone Mountain & Central Railroad
description: Set in the Yellowstone Mountains of Wyoming, this 55km long route offers a range of operations, including coal, iron ore, limestone, and steel. Complete with four sessions and a multiplayer session, there is plenty to explore on this route.

name: Trainz Plus: Yellowstone Mountain & Central Railroad
description: Set in the Yellowstone Mountains of Wyoming, this 55km long route offers a range of operations, including coal, iron ore, limestone, and steel. Complete with four sessions and a multiplayer session, there is plenty to explore on this route.

name: Before You Depart
description: Before You Depart is a slice-of-death visual novel made for the May Wolf Visual Novel Game Jam. Canines are often companions for life. Some can even be companions in death...

name: Puzzle by Nikoli S Yajilin
description: Draw lines through the centers of cells to make a loop, and paint cells black in this original Nikoli puzzle. It's immensely satisfying to see how the lines and black cells all come together to form a solution, and figuring out how to draw the loop isn't as easy as it might seem.

name: The Sims 4: Grunge Revival Kit
description: Explore nonconforming styles and make them your own with The Sims 4 Grunge Revival Kit*.

name: The Sims 4: Book Nook Kit
description: Relax in a plush, cozy space and get lost in a good story with The Sims 4 Book Nook Kit*.

name: Donut Dodo Do!
description:
Donut Dodo Do! is an exclusive for exA-Arcadia Cabinets.
Up to 2 players can climb, jump and run to collect all of the stolen donuts through 6 unique stages. Even casual players can play with this game by moving the joystick and pressing the single button to jump.

Choose to play up to 3 loops in the Arcade mode or go for the high score in Score Attack mode.

name: DJMax Respect V: V Extension IV Pack
description: Meet the 'DJMax Respect V Original Song' package now! This DLC contains a total of 20 Original songs.

name: Vesna
description: Vesna is an indie made fantasy, turn-based game. Made using Unreal Engine.

name: The Dead are Not Dead
description: Five years after the world is devastated by a zombie virus, Alfred is looking for Jake, his older brother. Facing a post-apocalyptic scenario and many flesh-thirsty zombies.
